songs.title: YAMBA YAMBA
songs.lyrics:
YAMBA YAMBA


chorus
Yamba x2 Yahwe yamba yamba Yahwe
(Yamba yamba Yahweee)


verse 1
 1.Yamba yamba vinu nabeto Yahwe


 2.Yamba yamba mampa kiesa na beto
(Yamba yamba Yahweee)


3.Yamba yamba mpesi 
na beto 
(Yamba yamba Yahweee)


4.(Yamba yamba
 bongo na beto(Yamba yamba Yahweee)


5.(Yamba yamba 
bana na beto (Yamba yamba Yahweee)


verse 2
6. Yamba yamba mampa nabeto Yahwe


verse 3
7. Yamba yamba esengo nabeto Yahwe


verse 4
 8.Yamba yamba mbongo nabeto Yahwe

169 MISA FADHILI


V. (Tenor):Bwana,Bwana,
      Utuhurumie, ee Bwana,
W. Bwana,Bwana,Bwana,
      Bwana, utuhurumie, 
V. (Bass):Ee Bwana, na
      V.(Tenor):Kristu, Kristu,
     Utuhurumie ,ee Kristu……


252 Mungu Baba pokea sadaka


verse 1
Mungu Baba, pokea sadaka
yetu leo
Twakutolea kwa jina la
Mwanao;
Ya Abel na Ibrahimu
ilikupendeza,
Yetu Baba ipendeze,
upokee tu;


chorus
K.    Upokee
W.   Sadaka yetu
K.   Ndilo fumbo
W.  La kupendeza
K.   La Baba
W.  Na Mwana, na Roho       Mtakatifu (x2)-


verse 2
Njoni wote tutoe sadaka
Yetu leo.
Kwa sifa na utukufu wake 
Mwenyezi.
Mkate huu na divai viwe
Mwili wake
Kwa heshima kuu sadaka 
Tumtolee


chorus
K.    Upokee
W.   Sadaka yetu
K.   Ndilo fumbo
W.  La kupendeza
K.   La Baba
W.  Na Mwana, na Roho       Mtakatifu (x2)-


verse 3
Ee mwenyezi 'tupokee Tuwe mali yako Twakusihi kwa shukrani Kuu 'tuipokee Tunakutolea nguvu, kazi na Mavuno. Kwa huruma yako dhambi  'tuondolee.


chorus
K.    Upokee
W.   Sadaka yetu
K.   Ndilo fumbo
W.  La kupendeza
K.   La Baba
W.  Na Mwana, na Roho       Mtakatifu (x2)-


verse 4
Kama mwanzo Mungu Baba
Mungu nasi asifiwe
Na Mwanaye ndiye
aliyetukomboa
Roho Mtakatifu ndiye  wetu
mfariji'  
Tatu Mtakatifu, Mungu
mmoja twakiri


chorus
K.    Upokee
W.   Sadaka yetu
K.   Ndilo fumbo
W.  La kupendeza
K.   La Baba
W.  Na Mwana, na Roho       Mtakatifu (x2)-


266 Upokee sadaka yetu


verse 1
Upokee sadaka yetu-
Twakutolea Baba.
Upokee navyo vipaji-
twakutolea Baba.


chorus
W.Pokea, Baba,zawadi;
Twakutolea  Baba. (x2)


verse2
Upokee m-kate wetu-
Upokee divai yetu-


chorus
W.Pokea, Baba,zawadi;
Twakutolea  Baba. (x2)


verse 3
Upokee mazao yetu-
Upokee na fedha zetu-


chorus
W.Pokea, Baba,zawadi;
Twakutolea  Baba. (x2)


verse 4
Nasi pia ni mali tako-
Tunatubu makosa yetu-


chorus
W.Pokea, Baba,zawadi;
Twakutolea  Baba. (x2)


verse 5
Upokee mioyo yetu-
Upokee na nafsi zetu-


chorus
W.Pokea, Baba,zawadi;
Twakutolea  Baba. (x2)


verse 6
Hayo yote ni mali yako-
Uyapokee kwa huruma-


chorus
W.Pokea, Baba,zawadi;
Twakutolea  Baba. (x2)


verse 7
Uviunge vipaji vyetu-
Na sadaka yake Mwanao-


chorus
W.Pokea, Baba,zawadi;
Twakutolea  Baba. (x2)


verse 8
Usifiwe, ewe Mtukufu
Kwa sadaka yake na yetu-


chorus
W.Pokea, Baba,zawadi;
Twakutolea  Baba. (x2)


verse 9
Tuhurumie wakosefu
Tuletee baraka yako-


chorus
W.Pokea, Baba,zawadi;
Twakutolea  Baba. (x2)


EKARISTIA NI CHAKULA


Chorus
Ekaristia ni chakula, chakula cha uzima wa milele
Ee mkate wa mbinguni, shibisha roho zetu.


Verse 1
Yesu mwokozi ,kashuka chini kwetu tukampokee.


Chorus
Ekaristia ni chakula, chakula cha uzima wa milele
Ee mkate wa mbinguni, shibisha roho zetu.


Verse 2
Maumbo haya, ni mwili wake Yesu, twakiri sote.


Chorus
Ekaristia ni chakula, chakula cha uzima wa milele
Ee mkate wa mbinguni, shibisha roho zetu.


Verse 3
Yesu mpenzi, pokea moyo wangu mimi ni wako.


Chorus
Ekaristia ni chakula, chakula cha uzima wa milele
Ee mkate wa mbinguni, shibisha roho zetu.


Verse 4
Ninakupenda, kuliko nafsi yangu, mwokozi wangu.


Chorus
Ekaristia ni chakula, chakula cha uzima wa milele
Ee mkate wa mbinguni, shibisha roho zetu.


Verse 5
Nakuabudu, ee Mungu nguvu yangu heri ya mbingu.


Chorus
Ekaristia ni chakula, chakula cha uzima wa milele
Ee mkate wa mbinguni, shibisha roho zetu.


170 Utukufu Fadhili


V. (Tenor):Utukufu kwa Mungu  mbinguni,
W. Utukufu kwako Mungu 
       Mbinguni na amani pote
        Duniani kwaowao watu 
        Wa mapenzi mema.


verse 1
Tunakuheshimu ,tunakusifu,
Tunakuabudu,twakutukuza
 ee Bwana


V. (Tenor):Utukufu kwa Mungu  mbinguni,
W. Utukufu kwako Mungu 
       Mbinguni na amani pote
        Duniani kwaowao watu 
        Wa mapenzi mema.


  Verse 2
Tunakushukuru, mfalme wa
        mbingu,
        Mwana wa pekee,Mwana
        Wa Baba, ee Bwana


V. (Tenor):Utukufu kwa Mungu  mbinguni,
W. Utukufu kwako Mungu 
       Mbinguni na amani pote
        Duniani kwaowao watu 
        Wa mapenzi mema.


verse 3
 Unayeondoa makosa yetu
     Utuhurumie, `tusikilize, ee Bwana 	


V. (Tenor):Utukufu kwa Mungu  mbinguni,
W. Utukufu kwako Mungu 
       Mbinguni na amani pote
        Duniani kwaowao watu 
        Wa mapenzi mema.									


verse 4
 Ku-ume kwa Baba
    Unapoketi,
    Mtakatifu, Mkuu,
    `tuhurumie, ee Bwana


V. (Tenor):Utukufu kwa Mungu  mbinguni,
W. Utukufu kwako Mungu 
       Mbinguni na amani pote
        Duniani kwaowao watu 
        Wa mapenzi mema.


verse 5
 Roho Mtakatifu pamoja nawe,
    Ndani yake Baba
     Unatukuzwa,ee Bwana         


V. (Tenor):Utukufu kwa Mungu  mbinguni,
W. Utukufu kwako Mungu 
       Mbinguni na amani pote
        Duniani kwaowao watu 
        Wa mapenzi mema.


SALA KABLA YA KOMUNIO


Ee Yesu, mkate wa mbingu, ninakututamani.
Uje kwangu uliye uzima na heri yangu.


Uje, chakula cha roho yangu, unitie imara.
Uje, Mwanakondoo wa Mungu, uondoe dhambi zangu.


Uje, mganga wa roho, uponye udhaifu wangu.
Uje, ee Yesu, uungune nami, Amina.


SALA BAADA YA KOMUNYO


KUABUDU


Ee Yesu wangu, nakuabudu moyoni mwangu ulimo, nakuungama ndiwe Bwana wangu na Mungu wangu, Mungu-Mtu na Mkombozi wangu.


Sifai mimi kukuabudu vema unavyostahili; nawaomba watakatifu na malaika wa mbinguni wakuabudu pamoja nami.


MAPENDO


Ee Yesu uliyejaa wema na mapendo, umekuja m oyoni mwangu.


Wewe Mwumba Mwenyezi umefika kwa kiumbe chako; wewe Mkombozi umefika kwa mtu mkosefu.


Umekuja kunipa hakika ya mapendo yako.  Nakupenda, Mungu wangu. Unitie mapendo, nikupende kama unavyostahili kupendwa.


SHUKRANI


Ee Yesu, nakushukuru sana kwani umenitendea makuu: umenilisha mwili wako mtukufu, umeungana nami kabisa.


Umeniongezea uzima rohoni mwangu; umenipa nguvu mpya ya kutenda mema; umenisaidia katika udhaifu wangu; nitakurudishia nini?


Umenipa moyo wako, nami nakupa moyo wangu na akili yangu, kazi zangu na mateso yangu, nafsi yangu yote.


Najitolea kuwa kitu chako kabisa.  Yesu wangu mimi ni mali yako katika maisha na saa ya kufa.


MAOMBI


Ee Yesu, mkarimu kwa wote wanaokuomba.  Uitunze neema yako, niendeleaa kukupenda.


Umetakasa mwili na roho.


Nakuomba ulimi wangu uliokugusa usiseme maneno mabaya: moyo wangu uliokupokea usitamani maovu; mwili wangu unamokaa ukutumikie kwa matendo ya haki.


Unilinde katika hatari na vishawishi;  unisaidie kuvumilia taabu na masumbuko; unizidishie upendo wako nipate kufanana nawe zaidi.


MAOMBEZI
Ee Yesu, mchungaji mwema, nakuomba uwatendee mema waliounganika nawe.


Ulinde kanisa lako lote, uwafanyizie vema jamaa zangu, rafiki na wafadhili, wakubwa na wanyonge.


Uwafariji maskini na wazee, uwainue wagonjwa na wanaozimia, uwapokee kwako roho za marehemu.


Ubariki nyumba zetu, wanyama wetu na mashamba yetu.  Utujalie mahitaji ya maisha, afya njema na riziki za kutosha.


Uwarudishie ndugu wote waliojitenga nawe waungane na kundi lako moja.  Na amani yako ikae na watu wote. Amina.


SALA YA MTAKATIFU INYASIO


Roho ya Kristu initakase.
Mwili wa Kristu uniokoe.


Damu ya Kristu inichangamshe.
Maji ya ubavu wa Kristu yanioshe.


Mateso ya Kristu nguvu yanizidishie.
Ee Yesu mwema, unisikilize.


Katika madonda yako unifiche.
Usikubali nitengane nawe.


Na adui mwovu unikinge
Saa kufa kwangu unite.


Uniamuru kwako nije.
Na watakatifu wako nikutukuze.


Milele na milele.  Amina.


KUIOMBEA PAROKIA YETU.


K.Ee Bwana Yesu Kristu, ndiwe kichwa cha kanisa lako hapa kwetu. Kwa matumaini tunakuomba kwa ajili ya waamini wote wa parokia yetu.
	


Uwalinde wote walio nyumbani na ugenini.
W.	Usikilize maombi yetu (baada ya kila aya)


K.	Uwaongoze wenye furaha na wenye huzuni
Uwavute watu wema na wenye bidii.


Uwaimarishe wote walio dhaifu.
Uwasimamishe walioanguka.


Uwahimize wavivu na wazembe.
uwaonye walio katika hatari ya kupotea.


Uwafariji wazima na wafu.


Atukuzwe Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.
Kama mwanzo na sasa na siku zote na milele milele Amina x 3


Tunaomba hayo kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu.  Amina.


Nasadiki  kwa mungu baba mwenyezi, mwumba mbingu na dunia .Na kwa yesu kristu mwanaye wa pekee, Bwana wetu , aliyetungwa kwa roho mtakatifu akazaliwa na bikira maria 
,akateswa kwa mamlaka ya ponsyo pilato ,akasulubiwa ,akafa, akazikwa, akashukia , kuzimu,  siku ya  tatu akafufuka katika wafu akapaa mbinguni amekaa  kuume kwa mungu baba mwenyezi  

toka huko atakuja kuwahukumu wazima na wafu nasadiki kwa roho mtakatifu kanisa takatifu katoliki ushirika wa watakatifu maondoleo ya dhambi ufufuko wa miili na uzima wa milele.
AMINA

SALA YA MTAKATIFU YOSEFU

Ee Yosefu mwenye heri, tunakimbilia kwako katika masumbuko yetu; na kisha omba shime ya Mchumba wako Mtakatifu,
tunaomba pia kwa matumaini usimamizi wako. 

Kwa ajili ya mapendo uliyompenda Bikira Mtakatifu mzazi wa Mungu, na kwa ajili ya kumtunza mtoto Yesu, twakuomba sana, utuangalie kwa wema siye tuliokuwa fungu lake Yesu Kristu, tukakombolewa kwa damu yake. Tusimamie katika masumbuko yetu kwa enzi na shime yako.

Ewe mlezi mwaminifu wa Familia Takatifu, uipe kibali familia yetu ya kiroho washiriki wote wa Jumuiya yetu ya Kikatoliki, utuunganishe kila wakati katika vifungo vya imani na upendo, na tubaki daima kwa moyo mmoja, akili na roho moja katika Moyo Mtakatifu wa Yesu na Moyo safi wa Bikira Maria.

Ee mlinzi amini wa jamaa takatifu, uwakinge watoto wateule wa Yesu Kristu. Ee Baba uliyetupenda mno tuepushe na kilema chochote cha madanganyo na upotevu. Ee kinga yetu mwezaji, utusimamie huko juu Mbinguni ulipo, tunaposhindana na wenye nguvu wakaao gizani,

 Kama vile siku za kale ukamwopoa mtoto Yesu katika hatari ya kuuawa, na leo hivi likinge Kanisa takatifu la Mungu katika mitego ya adui, na katika shida yote; mtunze daima kila mmoja wetu, kwa mfano wako, ili tupate na msaada wako, kukaa na utakatifu wa maisha, kufa kifo chema, na kupata Mbinguni makao ya raha milele. 
Amina.

Ngai niariturathimaga  arathime mawira maitu,Arathime Migunda itu twamutegera na rwendo x2


1.Ni agutuhe kiria giothe twamuhoya twamutegera na rwendo. 
Ni agutuhe buthi wa irio na mahiu-
Mawira maitu na mone umithio-


2.Mirimu  itu  yothe  ni agutuhunia –
Atuehererie  mogwati  mawiraini-
Mabiacara maitu magithereme


3.Riria  twahanda  agatuma  tugethe-
Thuthi mbuca  memenyi  atwehereri 
Ng'aragu gwitu iguthira  kaimana

NI HERI ZAIDI KUTOA


(Ni heri Zaidi kutoa, ni heri zaidi kutoa, kuliko kupokea ni heri zaidi kutoa kuliko kupokea) x2 (Ni heri ni heri zaidi kutoa, ni heri  ni heri zaidi kutoa)x2 kuliko kupokea x2)


1.Tunapaswa wote kuwasaidia waliodhaifu, tukikumbuka maneno yake Mtume Paulo, Heri zaidi kutoa kuliko kupokea......


2.Vitu vyote kweli tumepewa bure  tuvitoe bure, hatuna budi kuvirudisha Vitu vyote kwake, heri zaidi……


3. Hata kama ndugu unacho kidogo,usisite nenda vitu vyote ulivyo navyo     	   Mungu ndiye kakupa.Heri……… 	


AVE MARIA


Jina maria ni jina tukufu,lafurahisha linatutuliza Malaika mbinguni wanaliimba, usiku na mchana wanaliimba Wakisema (ave ave maria, ni jina tukufu jina la maria )x2


1.Maria  mama wa mungu tuombee 
Tuombee kwa mwanao yesu Kristu x 2


2.Jina lako siku zote papendeza
Wewe uliye mnara wa daudi x 2


3.Jina lako  siku zote lapendeza
Wewe uliye malkia wa mbinguni x 2


4.Twaliimba jina lako siku zote
Jina maria linatufurahisha x 2

POKEA MOYO WANGU


Pokea moyo wangu  ee Mungu wangu ,
Niweze kukupenda kwa pendo lako, Unipe moyo wako,Ewe yesu mkombozi wangu shinda kwangu nami daima kwako.


1.Onjeni mwone kwamba bwana yu mwema, na heri Yule mtu  Anayemtumaini yesu kristu.


2.Katika nguvu za giza katutoa, na kutukaribisha Katika ufalme wa pendo lake


3.Habari njema alituhubiria, na kutufungulia  Akatangaza mwaka wa neema


4.Mchungaji wangu mkuu ndiye bwana Yesu, sikosi kitu kamwe Huniongoza kwenye njia nyofu


5.Baraka na heshima na utukufu, na uweza kwa yeye Mwanakondoo wa Mungu milele

SASA WAKATI UMEFIKA


Chorus
Sasa wakati umefika wakushika nilicho nacho mimi
Kwa wema niende kwa Mungu nitoe zawadi.
Sasa wakati umefika kwenda mbele ya Mungu wangu mimi
Aone nilivyoandaa zawadi ya leo.


Nitamwambia Bwana pokea hiki kidogo nilicho nacho
Kwani Mungu wewe wanijua mimi siwezi hata kueleza
Nakusihi sana Baba unipokee
Nigawie na baraka niwe salama.


Verse 1
Mema yote niliyokuwa nayo yametoka kwa Mungu, 
hivyo nami ni kosa kusahau kumshukuru
Kwani kuwepo hapa leo hii ni kazi ya nani
Kamwe mimi sitapata uwezo pasipo Mungu.


Verse 2
Mema aliyotenda Mungu nijibu lini na vipi?
Mbona hofu yazidi kuwa ndani ya moyo wangu.
Mbele ya Bwana Mungu wangu kufanya siri ni bure, 
Yeye ndiye mpanga mambo yote ya wanadamu.


Verse 3
Pumzi inayonipa uhai inatoka kwa nani?
Bila Mungu hakika mwanadamu siwezi kitu.
Nimepata nafasi leo ya kwenda kutoa zawadi
Heri niende ya kesho siyo yangu ajua Baba.


Verse 4
Ewe muumba wa vyote duniani na vyote vya mbinguni
Mimi leo nakuja kwako Baba, nihurumie.
Baba ndiwe unayetawala kulala na kuamka kwangu
Juu yangu utake nini Baba kisifanyike.

Ulinde kanisa lako lote, uwafanyizie vema jamaa zangu, rafiki na wafadhili, wakubwa na wanyonge.


Uwafariji maskini na wazee, uwainue wagonjwa na wanaozimia, uwapokee kwako roho za marehemu.


Ubariki nyumba zetu, wanyama wetu na mashamba yetu.  Utujalie mahitaji ya maisha, afya njema na riziki za kutosha.


Uwarudishie ndugu wote waliojitenga nawe waungane na kundi lako moja.  Na amani yako ikae na watu wote. Amina.


SALA YA MTAKATIFU INYASIO


Roho ya Kristu initakase.
Mwili wa Kristu uniokoe.


Damu ya Kristu inichangamshe.
Maji ya ubavu wa Kristu yanioshe.


Mateso ya Kristu nguvu yanizidishie.
Ee Yesu mwema, unisikilize.


Katika madonda yako unifiche.
Usikubali nitengane nawe.


Na adui mwovu unikinge
Saa kufa kwangu unite.


Uniamuru kwako nije.
Na watakatifu wako nikutukuze.


Milele na milele.  Amina.


KUIOMBEA PAROKIA YETU.


K.Ee Bwana Yesu Kristu, ndiwe kichwa cha kanisa lako hapa kwetu. Kwa matumaini tunakuomba kwa ajili ya waamini wote wa parokia yetu.
	


Uwalinde wote walio nyumbani na ugenini.
W.	Usikilize maombi yetu (baada ya kila aya)


K.	Uwaongoze wenye furaha na wenye huzuni
Uwavute watu wema na wenye bidii.


Uwaimarishe wote walio dhaifu.
Uwasimamishe walioanguka.


Uwahimize wavivu na wazembe.
uwaonye walio katika hatari ya kupotea.


Uwafariji wazima na wafu.


Atukuzwe Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.
Kama mwanzo na sasa na siku zote na milele milele Amina x 3


Tunaomba hayo kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu.  Amina.

SALA KABLA YA KOMUNIO


Ee Yesu, mkate wa mbingu, ninakututamani.
Uje kwangu uliye uzima na heri yangu.


Uje, chakula cha roho yangu, unitie imara.
Uje, Mwanakondoo wa Mungu, uondoe dhambi zangu.


Uje, mganga wa roho, uponye udhaifu wangu.
Uje, ee Yesu, uungune nami, Amina.


SALA BAADA YA KOMUNYO


KUABUDU


Ee Yesu wangu, nakuabudu moyoni mwangu ulimo, nakuungama ndiwe Bwana wangu na Mungu wangu, Mungu-Mtu na Mkombozi wangu.


Sifai mimi kukuabudu vema unavyostahili; nawaomba watakatifu na malaika wa mbinguni wakuabudu pamoja nami.


MAPENDO


Ee Yesu uliyejaa wema na mapendo, umekuja m oyoni mwangu.


Wewe Mwumba Mwenyezi umefika kwa kiumbe chako; wewe Mkombozi umefika kwa mtu mkosefu.


Umekuja kunipa hakika ya mapendo yako.  Nakupenda, Mungu wangu. Unitie mapendo, nikupende kama unavyostahili kupendwa.


SHUKRANI


Ee Yesu, nakushukuru sana kwani umenitendea makuu: umenilisha mwili wako mtukufu, umeungana nami kabisa.


Umeniongezea uzima rohoni mwangu; umenipa nguvu mpya ya kutenda mema; umenisaidia katika udhaifu wangu; nitakurudishia nini?


Umenipa moyo wako, nami nakupa moyo wangu na akili yangu, kazi zangu na mateso yangu, nafsi yangu yote.


Najitolea kuwa kitu chako kabisa.  Yesu wangu mimi ni mali yako katika maisha na saa ya kufa.


MAOMBI


Ee Yesu, mkarimu kwa wote wanaokuomba.  Uitunze neema yako, niendeleaa kukupenda.


Umetakasa mwili na roho.


Nakuomba ulimi wangu uliokugusa usiseme maneno mabaya: moyo wangu uliokupokea usitamani maovu; mwili wangu unamokaa ukutumikie kwa matendo ya haki.


Unilinde katika hatari na vishawishi;  unisaidie kuvumilia taabu na masumbuko; unizidishie upendo wako nipate kufanana nawe zaidi.


MAOMBEZI
Ee Yesu, mchungaji mwema, nakuomba uwatendee mema waliounganika nawe.


Ulinde kanisa lako lote, uwafanyizie vema jamaa zangu, rafiki na wafadhili, wakubwa na wanyonge.


Uwafariji maskini na wazee, uwainue wagonjwa na wanaozimia, uwapokee kwako roho za marehemu.


Ubariki nyumba zetu, wanyama wetu na mashamba yetu.  Utujalie mahitaji ya maisha, afya njema na riziki za kutosha.


Uwarudishie ndugu wote waliojitenga nawe waungane na kundi lako moja.  Na amani yako ikae na watu wote. Amina.


SALA YA MTAKATIFU INYASIO


Roho ya Kristu initakase.
Mwili wa Kristu uniokoe.


Damu ya Kristu inichangamshe.
Maji ya ubavu wa Kristu yanioshe.


Mateso ya Kristu nguvu yanizidishie.
Ee Yesu mwema, unisikilize.


Katika madonda yako unifiche.
Usikubali nitengane nawe.


Na adui mwovu unikinge
Saa kufa kwangu unite.


Uniamuru kwako nije.
Na watakatifu wako nikutukuze.


Milele na milele.  Amina.


KUIOMBEA PAROKIA YETU.


K.Ee Bwana Yesu Kristu, ndiwe kichwa cha kanisa lako hapa kwetu. Kwa matumaini tunakuomba kwa ajili ya waamini wote wa parokia yetu.
	


Uwalinde wote walio nyumbani na ugenini.
W.	Usikilize maombi yetu (baada ya kila aya)


K.	Uwaongoze wenye furaha na wenye huzuni
Uwavute watu wema na wenye bidii.


Uwaimarishe wote walio dhaifu.
Uwasimamishe walioanguka.


Uwahimize wavivu na wazembe.
uwaonye walio katika hatari ya kupotea.


Uwafariji wazima na wafu.


Atukuzwe Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.
Kama mwanzo na sasa na siku zote na milele milele Amina x 3


Tunaomba hayo kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu.  Amina.

Mbele ya miungu K'uimbia Zaburi -nitakushukuru

Nitalisifu jina lako ee Baba -nitakushukuru

Ukanifariji unakitia nguvu -nitakushukuru

1.	Ee Bwana umenichunguza nakunijua ,wewe wajua kuketi kwangu na kuondoka kwangu 	umenifahamu wazo langu tokea mbali


2.	Umepepeta kwenda kwangu na kulala kwangu, umeelewa na njia zangu zote Bwana  hamna neno ulimi mwangu usilo lijua kabisa  Bwana

4.	Niende wapi nijiepushe na roho yako,niende wapi niukimbie uso wako kama ningepanda  mbinguni wewe upo,ningefanya kuzimu  kitanda changu wewe upo.

songs.title: 26TH JAN 2020
songs.lyrics:
TUKATE MINYORORO YA UFISADI

Baba yetu uliye mbinguni,umekuwa ukijali viumbe vyako ili tuishi kulingana na mapenzi yako.

umeibariki nchi yetu kwa wenye vipawa vingi na kutupatia mali asili za kutumiwa kwa sifa na utukufu wako na kwa manufaa ya kila Mkenya.

Tunahuzunishwa sana na utumiaji mbaya wa hizi zawadi na Baraka zako kwetu kupitia kwa tendo la ufisadi ambalo limesababishia watu kwa wengi wa njaa,magonjwa,

kuwanyima makao na kuwafurahisha makwao,kuwaacha wengi bilaelimu na kinga yoyote maishani.

Baba ni wewe pekee uwezaye kutuponya kutokana na ugonjwa huu ambao hatima yake ni mauti.

Tunakusihi uguse Maisha yet una ya viongozi wetu,ili tutambue uovu wa ufisadi na kujitahidi kikamilifu kuliangamiza jinamizi hilo mbaya.Kwa raia yeyote ambaye amejipatia chochote kifisadi na kukurejelea.

Tunakuomba utupe sisi raia wanaomcha Mung una viongozi wanaotujali na ambao watatuongoza katika njia ya amani,haki,ufanisi,maendeleo na la muhimu Zaidi upendo.

TUNAOMBA HAYO KUPITIA KWA KRISTO BWANA WETU
EE BWANA TUNAKUOMBA UTUSIKIE

LET  US  BREAK THE CHAIN  OF CORRUPTION

Father in heaven, You  always provide for  all your creatures, so  that they may live as you have always willed.  

You  have  blessed our country Kenya with rich human and natural resources to  be used in honour and glory and for the well being of every Kenyan. 

We  are deeply sorrowful for the wrong use of these your gifts and blessings through the act of corruption, as a result of which many of our people are  hungry, sick, homeless and displaced, ignorant and defenceless.  

Father, You  alone can heal us of this sickness which leads to  death. We  humbly beg you, touch our lives and those of our leaders so  that we  may realise the evil of corruption and work hard to eliminate it.  

For any citizen who has acquired anything through corrupt means, Lord, give him or her, the spirit of courage to  make a restitution and come back to  you. 

Raise up for  us God-fearing citizens and leaders who care for  us and who will lead us in the path of peace, justice, prosperity, progress and above all, Love. 

We  make our prayer through Christ our Lord.
Lord  graciously hear us.

V.The Lord be with you. 
R. And with your spirit. 
V. Lift up your hearts. 
R. We lift them up to the Lord. 
V. Let us give thanks to the Lord our God. 
R. It is right and just.

We proclaim your Death, O Lord, 
and profess your Resurrection 
until you come again.

When we eat this Bread and drink this Cup, 
we proclaim your Death, O Lord, 
until you come again.

Save us, Savior of the world,
for by your Cross and Resurrection 
you have set us free.

Our Father, who art in heaven, hallowed be thy name;thy kingdom come,thy will be done 
on earth as it is in heaven. 

Give us this day our daily bread, 
and forgive us our trespasses, as we forgive those who trespass against us; and lead us not into temptation,but deliver us from evil. 

For the kingdom, 
the power and the glory are yours 
now and for ever.

Lord, I am not worthy 
that you should enter under my roof, 
but only say the word 
and my soul shall be healed.

SOMO LA KWANZA
	Isaya	8:23b-9:3
“Katika Galilayaya Mataifa, watu wameona mwanga mkuu. ”

Wakati wa zamani Mungu ameishusha
nchi ya Zabuloni na nchi ya Naftali,lakini wakati utakapofika ataitukuza njia ya bahari,ng’ambo ya Yordani, na Galilaya ya raataifa.

Kabila lililotembea gizani limeona nuru kuu:nao waliokaa katika nchi ya kivuli cha mauti
mwanga uraewaangazia.

Umezidisha furaha yao, na umeongeza shangwe zao;wanashangilia mbele yako,kama wanavyoshangilia wavunaji,kama wanavyofurahi wenye kugawanya mateka.

Kwa maana mzigo uliowalemea, na gongo juu ya mabega yao,na fimbo ya wakandamizaji wao,umezivunjavunja, kama siku ile ya kushindwa kwa Midiani.

ZABURI YA KUITIKIZANA
	Zaburi 	27:1,4,	13-14	(K.

(K)
Bwana ni mwanga wangu na wokovu wangu.

Bwana ni mwanga wangu na wokovu wangu;nimwogope nani?Bwana ni kinga ya uzima wangu;nimhofu nani?

Naamini ya kuwa nitauona wema wa Bwana katika nchi ya walio hai.Umngoje Bwana, uwe hodari;ujipe moyo, naam, umngoje Bwana!

SOMO LA PILI
	1 	Wakorintho	1:10-13,	17
“Nawasihi ndugu zangu, kwamba,
migawanyiko isipatikane kwenu. ”	

Ndugu, nawasisitizia kwa jina la Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo, muwe na umoja ninyi nyote katika mashauri yenu. 

Migawanyiko isipatikane kwenu, bali mlingane katika nia moja na maoni yenu.Kwa maana, ndugu zangu, watu wa Kloe wameniarifu ya kuwa ugomvi umetokea kati yenu. 

Nataka kusema hivi: Mmoja wenu husema, “Mimi ni wa Paulo,” mwingine husema: “Mimi ni wa Apolo,” tena mwingine, “Mimi ni wa Kefa,” na “Mimi ni wa Kristo.”

Kwani, Kristo amegawanyika? Je, Paulo alisulibiwa kwa ajili yenu? Au mlibatizwa kwa jina la Paulo? Maana Kristo hakunituma kubatiza, bali kuihubiri Injili, lakini si kwa maneno ya hekima kusudi msalaba wa Kristo usishushiwe hadhi.

SHANGILIO LA INJILI
		Mathayo 	4:23
K. Aleluya. W. Aleluya.
K. Yesu alitangaza Injili ya ufalme
na kuponya kila namna ya magonjwa na maradhi kati ya watu.
W. Aleluya.

INJILI
	Mathayo 4:i2
“Alienda Kapernaumu ili litimie neno la nabii Isaya. ”

Yesu aliposikia ya kuwa Yohane ametupwa gerezani, alirudi Galilaya.
Aliondoka Nazareti, akaenda kukaa Kapemaurnu,kandoni mwa ziwa katika tarafa za Zabuloni na Naftali.

Hivyo litimie neno la nabii Isaya aliyesema:‘Nchi ya Zabuloni na nchi ya Naftali,kandokando ya bahari, ng’ambo ya Yordani,Galilaya ya mataifa,watu wakaao gizani wameuona mwanga mkuu.

Wenye kukaa katika nchi na uvuli wa mauti
wameangazwa na num.”Kutoka hapo Yesu alianza kuhubiri akisema,“Tubuni, kwa maana ufalme wa mbingu umekaribia.”Alitembea kando ya Bahari ya Galilaya, akawaona ndugu wawili.

Simoni aitwaye Petro, na nduguye Andrea, wakitupa wavu baharini kwa maana walikuwa wavuvi.Akawaambia, “Njoni mnifuate, nami nitawafanya kuwa wavuvi wa
watu.” Mara wakaziacha nyavu zao, wakamfuata.

Akaendelea mbele, akawaona ndugu wawili wengine, ndio Yakobo
mwana wa Zebedayo, na nduguye Yohane, wakitengeneza nyavu
zao chomboni, pamoja na baba yao Zebedayo.

Akawaita, mara wakakiacha chombo na baba yao, wakamfuata.Alizunguka katika Galilaya yote, akifundisha katika masinagogi
yao na kuitangaza injili ya Ufalme.
Akaponya kila namna ya magonjwa na maradhi kati ya watu.

FIRST READING
	Isaiah 9:1-4
In Galilee of the nations, the people have seen a great light.

In the former time he brought into contempt the land of Zebulun and the land of Naphtali, but in the latter time he will make glorious the way of the sea, the land beyond the Jordan, Galilee of the nations.

The people who walked in darkness have seen a great light; those who dwelt in a land of deep darkness, on them has light shined.

You have multiplied the nation, you have increased its joy; they rejoice before you as with joy at the harvest, as men rejoice when they divide the spoil.

For the yoke of his burden,and the staff for his shoulder, the rod of his oppressor, you have broken as on the day of Midian.

RESPONSORIAL PSALM
	Psalm 27:1.4.13-14 (R. la)

(R)
The Lord is my light and my salvation.

The Lord is my light and my salvation;whom shall I fear?The Lord is the stronghold of my life; 
whom should I dread?

There is one thing I ask of the Lord,only this do I seek:to live in the house of the Lord all the days of my life,to gaze on the beauty of the Lord,
to inquire at his temple.

I believe I shall see the Lord’s goodness in the land of the living.Wait for the Lord; be strong;be stouthearted, and wait for the Lord!

SECOND READING
	1 Corinthians 1:10-13.17
“l appeal to you, brethren, that there be no dissensions among you. ”

I appeal to you, brethren, by the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, that all of you agree and that there be no dissensions among you, but that you be united in the same mind and the same judgement. 

For it has been reported to me by Chloe’s people that there is quarrelling amongst you, my brethren. 

What I mean is that each one of you says, “I belong to Paul,” or “I belong to Apollos,” or “I belong to Cephas,” or “I belong to Christ.” Is Christ divided? 

Was Paul crucified for you? Or were you baptised in the name of Paul? For Christ did not send me to baptise but to preach the Gospel, and not with eloquent wisdom, lest the cross of Christ be emptied of its power.

ALLELUIA
	Cf. Matthew 4:23
V. Alleluia. R. Alleluia.
V. Jesus was preaching the Gospel of the kingdom and healing every infirmity among the people.
R. Alleluia.

GOSPEL
	Matthew 4:12-23
“He went to Capernaum, that what was spoken by the prophet Isaiah might be fulfilled. ” 

When Jesus heard that John had been arrested, he withdrew into Galilee; and leaving Nazareth he went and dwelt in Capernaum by the sea, in the territory of Zebulun and Naphtali, that what was spoken by the prophet Isaiah might be fulfilled:

“The land of Zebulun and the land of Naphtali, towards the sea, across the Jordan, Galilee of the Gentiles - the people who sat in darkness have seen a great light, and for those who sat in the region and shadow of death light has dawned.”From that time Jesus began to preach, saying, “Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.” 

As he walked by the Sea of Galilee, he saw two brothers, Simon who is called Petei and Andrew his brother, casting a net into the sea; for they were fishermen. 

Ami he said to them, “Follow me, and I will make you fishers of men.” Immediately they left their nets and followed him. 

And going on from there he saw two othci brothers, James the son of Zebedee and John his brother, in the boat with Zebediv their father, mending their nets, and he called them. 

Immediately they left the boal and their father, and followed him. And he went about all Galilee, teaching in theii synagogues and preaching the Gospel of the kingdom and healing every disease and every infirmity among the people.



PRAYERS OF THE FAITHFUL
*CHURCH
*COUNTRY
*FAMILY
*SICK
*CHAIN OF CORRUPTION

songs.title: 31st usiku.MISA
songs.lyrics:
SOMO LA KWANZA 
1Yohane 2:18-21
Mmepakwa mafuta na yeye aliye Mtakatifu,na nyote mmejaliwa ujuzi

Watoto,ni wakati wa mwisho.Ni kama mlivyosikia,mpinga kristo hana budi kuja. Sasa wapinga kristo wengi wamekwishafika.Hivyo tumetambua ya kuwa ni wakati wa mwisho.Wametokea kwctu, lakini si wenzetu. 

Kama wangalikuwa wenzetu, wangalishinda kwctu. Lakini wamctokca, kusudi waonckanc wazi ya kuwa hakuna hata mmoja wao ambaye ni mwcnzclu.
Lakini ninyi mmcpakwa malîlta na yeye aliye Mtakatifu, na nyote mmejaliwa ujuzi.



Sikuwaandikicni kama watu wasioijua kweli, bali kama watu waijuao, kwa sababu kwcli haizai uongo wowote.
Neno la Bwana.




ZABURI YA KUMTIKIZANA 
Zaburi 96:1-2,11-12,13(k11a)

K. 
Mbingu na zifurahi, nchi na ishangilie.


Mwimbieni Bwana wimbo mpya; mwimbieni Bwana, nchi yote.
Mwimbieni Bwana, lisifuni jina lake; siku kwa siku tangazeni wokovu wake. K.

Mbingu na zifurahi, nchi na ishangilie; bahari na ivume na vyote viijazavyo; mashamba na yachangamke, na vyote vilivyomo. K.




Ndipo miti yote ya msİtuni itaimba kwa furaha, mbele za Bwana, kwa kuwa anakuja, kwa kuwa anakuja kuihukumu nchi; atauhukumu ulimwengu kwa haki, nayo mataifa kwa uaminifu wake. K.




SHANGILIO
Yohane 1:14a.12a 
 Neno alifanyika mwili, akakaa kwetu. Wote waliompokea aliwapa uwezo wa kuwa watoto Wa Mungu 
 Aleluya.

INJILI
Yohane 1:1-18
”Neno alifanyika mwili"

Mwanzoni kulikuwako Neno, naye Neno alikuwa kwa Mungu. Na Neno huyu alikuwa Mungu.
Huyu mwanzoni alikuwako kwa Mungu. Kwa Neno vyote vimeumbwa, na pasipo Neno hakikuumbwa chochote kilichoumbwa.

 Ndani yake ulikuwamo uzima, na uzima ulikuwa ni mwanga wa wanadamu; na mwanga huo uliangaza gizani, lakini giza halikuupokea. Palitokea mtu, ametumwa na Mungu, jina lake Yohane.
Huyo alikuja kutoa ushuhuda, apate kuushuhudia mwanga ili wote wasadiki kwa sababu yake. 

Yeye hakuwa ule mwanga, ila wajibu wake ulikuwa kuushuhudia ule mwanga. Alikuwako mwanga halisi amwangazaye kila mtu, alikuwa ulimwenguni humu. Alikuwako ulimwenguni, nao ulimwengu uliumbwa kwa njia yake, lakini ulimwengu haukumtambua.


Alifika kwa walio wake, nao walio wake hawakumpokea. Lakini wote waliompokea aliwapa uwezo wa kuwa watoto wa Mungu, ndio wale wasadikio kwa jina lake, waliozaliwa, si kwa damu, wala kwa tamaa ya mwili, wala kwa tamaa ya mwanadamu bali kwa mapenzi ya Mungu.


Neno akafanyika mwili, akakaa kwetu; nasi tumeuona utukufu wake, utukufu kama wa mzaliwa wa pekee wa Baba, amejaa neema na kweli. Yohane alimshuhudia na alipaza sauti akasema, ”Huyu ndiye niliyemtaja niliposema, 'Anayekuja nyuma yangu amekuwa mbele yangu, kwa maana alikuwa kabla yangu.”'





Katika ukamilifu wake sisi sote tumepokea neema juu ya neema. Kwa maana sheria imetolewa kwa njia ya Musa, lakini neema na kweli zimepatikana kwa Yesu Kristo.
Hakuna aliyemwona Mungu. Mwana wa pekee, Mungu, aliye kifuani mwa Baba, amemtambulisha kwetu.
Injili ya Bwana.

songs.title: 3rd of easter
songs.lyrics:
FIRST READING    
 Acts 3:13-15,17-19ab
“You killed the Author of life, whom God raised from the dead.”


In those days: Peter said to the people, “The God of Abraham and of Isaac and of Jacob, the God of our fathers, glorified his servant Jesus, whom you delivered up and denied in the presence of Pilate,

 when he had decided to release him. But you denied the Holy and Righteous One, and asked for a murderer to be granted to you, and killed the Author of life, whom God raised from the dead. 

To this we are witnesses. And now, brethren, I know that you acted in ignorance, as did also your rulers. But what God foretold by the mouth of all the prophets, 

that his Christ should suffer, he thus fulfilled. Repent therefore and turn again, that your sins may be blotted out.” 
     The word of the Lord.

SECOND READING  
1 John 2:1-5a
“He is the expiation for our sins, but also for the sins of the whole world.”



My little children, I am writing this to you so that you may not sin; but if anyone does sin, we have an advocate with the father, Jesus Christ the righteous and he is the expiation of our sins,

 and not for ours only but also for the sins of the whole world. And by this we may be sure that we know him, if we keep a commandments. He who says “I know him”

 but disobeys his commandments is a liar, and the truth is not in him; but whoever keeps his word, in him truly love for God is perfected.
The Word of the Lord.

GOSPEL ACCLAMATION 
Luke 24:32
V. Alleluia   R. Alleluia
V. Lord Jesus, open the Scriptures to us; 
     Make our hearts burn with love when you speak to us. 
R. Alleluia

GOSPEL     
Luke 24:35-48
Thus it is written that the Christ should suffer and on the third day raise from the dead.
A reading from the holy Gospel according to Luke.

At that time: the two disciples told what had happened on the road, and how Jesus was known to them in the breaking of the bread. As they were saying this, Jesus himself stood among them, 

and said to them, “Peace to you”. But they were startled and frightened, and supposed that they saw a spirit, and he said to them, “Why are you troubled and why do questionings rise in your hearts?

 See my hands and my feet, that it is I myself; handle me, and see; for a spirit has not flesh and bones as you see that I have.” And when he had said this he showed them his hands and his feet.

 And while they still disbelieved for joy, and wondered, he said to them, “Have you anything here to eat?” They gave him a piece of broiled fish and he took it and ate before them.

 Then he said to them, “These are my words which I spoke to you, while I was still with you, and everything written about me in the Law of Moses and the prophets and the psalms must be fulfilled.

” Then he opened their minds to understand the scriptures, and said to them, “Thus it is written, that the Christ should suffer and on the third day raise from the dead,

 and that repentance and forgiveness of sins should be preached in his name to all nations, beginning from Jerusalem. You are witnesses of these things.”
       The Gospel of the Lord.


RESPONSORIAL PSALM        
Psalms 4:1,3,6, 8, (R. 6b)


R. 
Lift up the light of your face on us, O Lord.

I called, the God of justice gave me answer; From anguish you released me, Have mercy and hear me! R.


Know that the LORD works wonders for his faithful one;
The LORD will hear me whenever I call him. R.


“What can bring up happiness?” Many say.
Lift up the light of your face on us, O LORD. R.

In peace I will lie down and fall asleep,
For you alone, O LORD,
Make me dwell in safety. R.

songs.title: AMETAMALAKI2024
songs.lyrics:
AMETAMALAKI


VERSE 1
1. Njooni na vinanda, ngoma, zeze, vinubi tumpigie Mungu wetu mziki mtakatifu.


CHORUS
Ametamalaki, ametamalaki Bwana mbinguni ni yeye ametamalaki Bwana duniani ni yeye ametamalaki Bwana ametamalaki ametamalaki Bwana.


VERSE 2
2. Malaika mbinguni wanamsifu Mungu, na duniani pia asifiwaye Mungu wa milele.


CHORUS
Ametamalaki, ametamalaki Bwana mbinguni ni yeye ametamalaki Bwana duniani ni yeye ametamalaki Bwana ametamalaki ametamalaki Bwana.


VERSE 3

Ametamalaki, ametamalaki Bwana mbinguni ni yeye ametamalaki Bwana duniani ni yeye ametamalaki Bwana ametamalaki ametamalaki Bwana.


VERSE 4

CHORUS
Ametamalaki, ametamalaki Bwana mbinguni ni yeye ametamalaki Bwana duniani ni yeye ametamalaki Bwana ametamalaki ametamalaki Bwana.


VERSE 5

CHORUS
Ametamalaki, ametamalaki Bwana mbinguni ni yeye ametamalaki Bwana duniani ni yeye ametamalaki Bwana ametamalaki ametamalaki Bwana.

songs.title: ANGELS WE HAVE HEARD ON HIGH
songs.lyrics:
Angels we have heard on high
Sweetly singing o'er the plains,
And the mountains in reply
Echoing their joyous strains.




Angels we have heard on high
Sweetly, sweetly through the night
And the mountains in reply
Echoing their brief delight.




Gloria, in excelsis Deo!
Gloria, in excelsis Deo!

Shepherds, why this jubilee?
Why your joyous strains prolong?
What the gladsome tidings be
Which inspire your heavenly song?


Come to Bethlehem and see
Him whose birth the angels sing;
Come, adore on bended knee,
Christ the Lord, the newborn King




Angels we have heard
Angels we have heard on high
Angels we have heard, oh
Angels we have heard on high
Angels we have heard on high
Angels we have heard on high
In excelsis Deo

songs.title: another year karis
songs.lyrics:
1. Another year is dawning, Dear Father, let it be,
in working or in waiting,
another year with thee.


Another year of leaning
upon thy loving breast, another year of trusting,
of quiet, happy rest.



2. Another year of mercies,
of faithfulness and grace;
another year of gladness
in the shining of thy face.


Another year of progress,
another year of praise,
another year of proving
thy presence all the days.


3. Another year of service,
of witness for thy love;
another year of training
for holier work above.





Another year is dawning!
Dear Father, let it be
on earth, or else in heaven,
another year for thee.

the Lamp?

are you washed in the blood of the lamb, are you fully
trusting in his grace this hour are you washed in the blood of the
lamb


2. Are you walking daily by the saviour side? are you washed
in the blood of the lamb? do you rest each moment in the crucified?
are you washed in the blood of the lamb 


3. when the bridegroom come the will your robes be white? are you washed in 
the blood of the lamb will your be ready for the mansion bride and be washed
in the blood of the lamb


4. lay aside the garment that are stained with sin and be washed in the 
blood of the lamb there's a fauntain flowing for the soul and clean on be 
washed in the blood of the lamb.

 Aria mehokete Ngai matiuragira na ningi magtitoraio ni uru(jehova niamagitagira mahindaini mothe)*2

Namagatherema.


2. Hindi iria thu ciao ciramokirira cikamaima thayu na ikamahahura,guoko kwa Jehova kuri iguru riao gutiri undu ona ume muru Ungimanyita.



3.Mathekagirirwo magatuirwo mata niaria mehokete hinya wa guku thi, no indi jehova niwe hinya wao, marigiririoni Niamatugagiria.
 


4. Metikitie Ngai na makamwihoka maundu-ini mothe amatongoragie,nake ni muthingu n ani mwihokeku kwoguo ndari hindi Akamaconora




5.Takimuiniriei takimugocei nario ritwa riake mukiriambararie,kuona ati tha ciake kinyagira njiarwa naguo utugi wake niwa hindi ciothe

songs.title: bishopJUMAMOSI
songs.lyrics:
SOMO LA KWANZA
	Matendo Mitume 28:16-20, 30-31
'Aliishi Roma, akihubiri habari ya ufalme wa Mungu. "



Baada ya Paulo na mafariki zake kufika Roma, Paulo aliruhusiwa kukaa peke yake pamoja na askari aliyemlinda. Baada ya siku tatu aliwaita viongozi wa Wayahudi wakutane kwake. 

Walipokwisha kukusanyika aliwaambia, "Ndugu zangu, ingawa sikulikosea taifa letu wala sikuvunja desturi za wazee wetu, nilifungwa Yerusalemu na kutiwa mikononi mwa Warumi.

 Hao waliponihoji walitaka kuniacha kwa sababu sikuwa na kosa listahililo kifo. Lakini kwa kuwa Wayahudi walipinga, nilishurutishwa kukata rufaa kwa Kaisari, lakini Sio kwa kuwashtaki Wayahudi wenzangu. 

Basi, kwa sababu hiyo, niliwaombeni tuonane ili nizungumze nanyi, kwa maana kwa ajili ya tumaini la Israeli ninachukua minyororo hii."
Kwa muda wa miaka miwili mizima alikaa katika nyumba yake ya kupanga. 




Akawapokea wote waliomwendea; alihubiri wazi wazi ufalme Wa Mungu na mafundisho kumhusu Bwana Yesu Kristo
bila kupingwa.
Neno la Bwana.




INJILI
Yohane 21:20-25
"Huyu ndiye mfuasi aliyeyaandika hayo yote na ushuhuda wake ni wa kweli."



Wakati ule: Petro aligeuka na akamwona yule mwanfunzi ambaye Yesu alimpenda, ndiye yeye aliyeegemea kifuani pake Yesu kara muni na ambaye aliuliza, 

"Bwana, ni nani atakayekusaliti?"
Basi, Petro akamwuliza Yesu, "Bwana, na kwa huyu itakuwaje?” Yesu akamwambia, 

"Nikitaka huyu akae hadi nitakaporudi, je, inakuhusu nini? Wewe nifuate."
Hapo habari ikavuma, ya kwamba mfuasi huyu hafi. 

Lakini Yesu hakumwambia hafi, bali "Nikitaka huyu akae hivi hata nijapo, je, inakuhusu nini?"
Huyu ndiye mfuasi aliyeshuhudia na kuandika hayo yote,


 nasi twajua ya kuwa ushuhuda wake ni kweli. Kuna mengine mengi aliyoyafanya Yesu, lakini kama yote yangeandikwa moja moja, nadhani ulimwengu wote haungetosha kuweka vitabu vitakiwavyo kuandikwa.
Injili ya Bwana.


ZABURI YA KUITIKIZANA
Zaburi11:4:5 na 7(K


K.
Wanyofu wa moyo watauona uso wako, ee Bwana.


Bwana yumo katika hekalu lake takatifu; kiti cha enzi cha Bwana kiko mbinguni. Macho yake yanaangalia, kwa makini; macho yake yanawachunguza wanadamu. K




Bwana humjaribu mtu mwenye haki na mbaya, anawachukia wapendao vita,na huwaadhibu watendao maovu.
Bwana ni mwenye haki na anayapenda yaliyo haki wanyofu wa moyo watauona uso wake.K



SHANGILIO LA INJILI
 Aleluya.
 Nitamtuma kwenu Roho wa ukweli, asema Bwana;
yeye atawaongoza katika ukweli wote.
Aleluya.

songs.title: BODY AND BLOOD OF THE LORD
songs.lyrics:
SEQUENCE

1.Zion, praise your Saviour,
Praise your leader and shepherd in hymns and canticles,
Praise him as much as you can,
for he is beyond all praising
and you will never be able to praise him as he merits.


2.But today a theme worthy of particular praise
Is put before us –
the living and life-giving bread
that, without any doubt,
was given to the Twelve at the table during holy supper.


3.Therefore let our praise be full and resounding
and our soul’s rejoicing full of delight and beauty,
for this is the festival day
to commemorate the first institution of this table.




4.At this table of the new King,
the new law’s new Pasch puts an end to the old Pasch.
The new displaces the old,
reality the shadow and light the darkness.
Christ wanted what he did at the supper
to be repeated in his memory.


5.And so we, in accordance with his holy directions
consecrate bread and wine to be salvation’s Victim.
Christ’s followers know by faith
that bread is changed into his flesh
and wine into his blood.




6.Man cannot understand this, cannot perceive it;
but a lively faith affirms that the change,
which is outside the natural course of things, takes place.
Under the different species,
which are now signs only and not their own reality,
There lie hid wonderful realities.
His body is our food, his blood our drink.


7.And yet Christ remains entire under each species.
The communicant receives the complete Christ –
uncut, unbroken and undivided.
Whether one receive or a thousand,
the one receives as much as the thousand.
Nor is Christ diminished by being received.


8.The good and the wicked alike receive him,
But with the unlike destiny of life or death.
To the wicked it is death,
but life to the good.
See how different is the result,
though each received the same.


9.Last of all, if the sacrament is broken, have no doubt.
Remember there is as much in a fragment
As in unbroken host.
There is no division of the reality,
but only a breaking of the sign;
nor does the breaking diminish the condition or size
of the One hidden under the sign.


10.Behold, the bread of angels is become the pilgrim’s food;
truly it is bread for the sons, and is not to be cast to dogs.
It was prefigured in type
when Isaac was brought as an offering,
when a lamb was appointed for the Pasch
and when manna was given to the Jews of old.




11. Jesus, good shepherd and true bread,
have mercy on us; feed us and guard us.
Grant that we find happiness
In the land of the living.
You know all things, can do all things,
and feed us here on earth.
Make us your guests in heaven,
co-heirs with you and companions of heaven citizens.
Amen. Alleluia.

SEKWENSIA

1 Ee Sayuni mtukuze,
Uwezavyo umwimbie,
Mkombozi na Mwalimu
apitaye kila sifa,
Kwa nyimbo na shangwe kuu,
Itokayo kwa watu,


2 Nia yetu ya kusifu,
Lishe hili walipewa,
Hasa mkate Mtakatifu,
Wale kumi na wawili,
Uletao uzima,
Karamuni mwa mwisho.


3)Shangilio la rohoni, 
Lipendeze liwe zuri,
Sifa tele livune, 
Ipo leo siku kubwa,
Kwa kumbusho la kuwekwa,
Kwanza ile karamu.


4 Muda ule umekwisha,
Ipo meza ya mfalme,
Na sheria mpya,
Tumepata mapya yote.
Nuru, sio nusu giza,
Mwanga sio usiku.



5 Tendo lake karamuni,
Kristo ametuamuru,
Tutende tumkumbuke,
Twafuata amri yake,
Tukitoa hii sadaka,
Kwa mkate na divai.



6 Mkate wageuka mwili,
Na divai ikawa damu,
Kanuni kwa Wakristo,
Huelewi huioni,
Kweli hio; hukubali,
Maana ni muujiza mkuu.



7 Unaota tu maumbo,
Ni alama zifumbazo,
Utukufu wenyewe,
Ule mwili unywe damu,
Kila umbo linafumba,
Yesu mzima halisi.


8 Ukipewa tu kimego,
Umempata Yesu mzima,
Si sehemu yake tu,
Moja hula, elfu hula,
Wote hupokea sawa,
Na mpokewa hakomi.



9 Hula wema na wabaya,
Kwa bahati mbali mbali,
Kifo au uzima,
Basi, mkate Mtakatifu,
Huwa sumu kwa wabaya,
Dawa bora kwa wema.




10 Ikimegwa sakramenti,
Usisite, uamini,
Huwa ndani ya kipande,
Mwili wote wa Yesu,
Mwili wake haumegwi,
Ni alama ivunjwayo,
Hali yake pia kimo cha,
mwenyewe ni sawa.



11 Kumbe mkate wa Malaika
Huwalisha wasafiri,
Kweli mkate wa wana,
Usitupwe kwa mbwa,
Hii mifano ya zamani,
Hutolewa mwana Isaka,
Na kondoo kuchinjwa pasaka,
Pia maana ya jangwani.



12 Ee Mchungaji wetu mwema,
Yesu utuhurumie,
Utuchunge utulinde,
Ee Mchungaji wetu mwema,
Tuonyeshe mema yako,
Huko kwenye wazima.


13) Ee Mchungaji wetu mwema,
Ee Mwenyezi na Mjuaji,
Mwenye kutuchunga hapa,
Tujalie pia huko,
Tushiriki meza moja,
Na raia wa mbinguni. Amina.

NJONI TUMFANYIE SHANGWE MUNGU WETU

Inukeni wote tuimbe pamoja,
Njoni tumfanyie shangwe Mungu wetu
Kwa miondoko ya raha na kucheza….

2.	Ona ametenda wema wa ajabu…

TUHURUMIE (AMECEA)


Bwana utuhurumie (Ee Bwana) Bwana utuhurumie x2


Kristu utuhurumie (Ee Kristu) Kristu utuhurumie  x 2


Bwana utuhurumie (Ee Bwana) Bwana utuhurumie x2


UTUKUFU AMECEA


Utukufu kwa Mungu juu mbinguni * amani kote duniani (Kwa watu) wenye mapenzi mema


Tunakusifu Baba tunakuheshimu Twakuabudu sisi tunakutukuza x2


Twakushukuru Mungu kwa ‘tukufu wc mkuu ewe Mungu Mfalme (Ee Baba mbingu Baba yetu


Bwana wetu mwokozi Yesu Kristu Mwar: wa pekee wake Mungu (Uliye) Mwana kondoo wa Mungu


Unayeziondoa dhambi zote za dunia utuhurumie (pokea) pokea ombi letu


Wewe unayeketi kuume kwake Be: utuhuruimie (Sikia) sikia ombi letu


Kwani peke yako ndiye Bwana peke yako mkuu na Mkombozi (Pekee) peke  Yesu Kristu


Kwa umoja wa Roho Mtakatifu ndani yake Bwana watukuzwa (Ee Yesu) milele na milele

FIRST READING
           Deuteronomy 8:2-3,14b-16a
He fed you with manna, which you did not know, 
    nor did your fathers know.
 


Moses spoke to the people, saying, “You shall remember all the way which the LORD your God has led you these forty years in the wilderness, that he might humble you, 

testing you to know what was in your heart, whether you would keep his commandments, or not. And he humbled you and let you know hunger and fed you with manna, which you did not know, nor did your fathers know;

 that he might make you know that man does not live by bread alone, but that man lives by everything that proceeds out of the mouth of the LORD. 



And you shall remember the LORD your God, who brought you out of the land of Egypt, out of the house of bondage, who led you through the great and terrible wilderness, 





with its fiery serpents and scorpions and thirsty ground where there was no water, who brought you water out of the flinty rock, who fed you in the wilderness with manna which your fathers did not know.”
The word of the Lord.



RESPONSORIAL PSALM 
                                 				Psalms 147:12
-13, 14-15, 19-20 (R. 12a)

R.
 O Jerusalem, glorify the Lord!




O Jerusalem, glorify the LORD!
O Zion, praise your God!
He has strengthened the bars of your gates;
He has blessed your children within you. R.




He established peace on your borders;
he gives you your fill of finest wheat.
He sends out his word to the earth,
and swiftly runs his command.  R.




He reveals his word to Jacob;
To Israel, his decrees and judgments.
He has not dealt thus with other nations;
He has not taught them his judgements. R.



SECOND READING
              1Corinthians 10:16-17
Because there is one bread, we who are many are one body.

Saint Paul to the Corinthians
Brethren: The cup of blessing which we bless, is it not a participation in the blood of Christ? The bread which we break, 



is it not a participation in the body of Christ? Because there is one bread, we who are many are one body, for we all partake of the one bread.
The word of the Lord



GOSPEL ACCLAMATION
  John 6:51              
 Alleluia.
  Am the living bread which came down from heaven, says the Lord;
if anyone eats this bread he will live for ever.
 Alleluia.

GOSPEL									   
John 6:51- 58
My flesh is food indeed, and my blood is drink indeed.

At that time: Jesus said to the crowds of the Jews, “I am the living bread which came down from heaven; if anyone eats of this bread, he will live for ever; and the bread which I shall give for the life of the world is my flesh.

” The Jews then disputed among themselves, saying, “How can this man give us his flesh to eat?”   So Jesus said to them, “Truly, truly, I say to you, unless you eat the flesh of the Son of man and drink his blood, you have no life in you; 


he who eats my flesh and drinks my blood has eternal life, and I will raise him up at the last day. For my flesh is food indeed, and my blood is drink indeed. He who eats my flesh and drinks my blood abides in me, and I in hm. 




As the living Father sent me, and I live because o the FATHER, so he who eats me will live because of me. This is the bread which came down from heaven, not such as the fathers ate and died; he who eats this bread will live for ever.”
The Gospel of the Lord



SALA KABLA YA KOMUNIO


Ee Yesu, mkate wa mbingu, ninakututamani.
Uje kwangu uliye uzima na heri yangu.


Uje, chakula cha roho yangu, unitie imara.
Uje, Mwanakondoo wa Mungu, uondoe dhambi zangu.


Uje, mganga wa roho, uponye udhaifu wangu.
Uje, ee Yesu, uungane nami, Amina.


SALA BAADA YA KOMUNYO


KUABUDU


Ee Yesu wangu, nakuabudu moyoni mwangu ulimo, nakuungama ndiwe Bwana wangu na Mungu wangu, Mungu-Mtu na Mkombozi wangu.


Sifai mimi kukuabudu vema unavyostahili; nawaomba watakatifu na malaika wa mbinguni wakuabudu pamoja nami.


MAPENDO


Ee Yesu uliyejaa wema na mapendo, umekuja m oyoni mwangu.


Wewe Mwumba Mwenyezi umefika kwa kiumbe chako; wewe Mkombozi umefika kwa mtu mkosefu.


Umekuja kunipa hakika ya mapendo yako.  Nakupenda, Mungu wangu. Unitie mapendo, nikupende kama unavyostahili kupendwa.


SHUKRANI


Ee Yesu, nakushukuru sana kwani umenitendea makuu: umenilisha mwili wako mtukufu, umeungana nami kabisa.


Umeniongezea uzima rohoni mwangu; umenipa nguvu mpya ya kutenda mema; umenisaidia katika udhaifu wangu; nitakurudishia nini?


Umenipa moyo wako, nami nakupa moyo wangu na akili yangu, kazi zangu na mateso yangu, nafsi yangu yote.


Najitolea kuwa kitu chako kabisa.  Yesu wangu mimi ni mali yako katika maisha na saa ya kufa.


MAOMBI


Ee Yesu, mkarimu kwa wote wanaokuomba.  Uitunze neema yako, niendeleaa kukupenda.


Umetakasa mwili na roho.


Nakuomba ulimi wangu uliokugusa usiseme maneno mabaya: moyo wangu uliokupokea usitamani maovu; mwili wangu unamokaa ukutumikie kwa matendo ya haki.


Unilinde katika hatari na vishawishi;  unisaidie kuvumilia taabu na masumbuko; unizidishie upendo wako nipate kufanana nawe zaidi.


MAOMBEZI
Ee Yesu, mchungaji mwema, nakuomba uwatendee mema waliounganika nawe.


Ulinde kanisa lako lote, uwafanyizie vema jamaa zangu, rafiki na wafadhili, wakubwa na wanyonge.


Uwafariji maskini na wazee, uwainue wagonjwa na wanaozimia, uwapokee kwako roho za marehemu.


Ubariki nyumba zetu, wanyama wetu na mashamba yetu.  Utujalie mahitaji ya maisha, afya njema na riziki za kutosha.


Uwarudishie ndugu wote waliojitenga nawe waungane na kundi lako moja.  Na amani yako ikae na watu wote. Amina.


SALA YA MTAKATIFU INYASIO


Roho ya Kristu initakase.
Mwili wa Kristu uniokoe.


Damu ya Kristu inichangamshe.
Maji ya ubavu wa Kristu yanioshe.


Mateso ya Kristu nguvu yanizidishie.
Ee Yesu mwema, unisikilize.


Katika madonda yako unifiche.
Usikubali nitengane nawe.


Na adui mwovu unikinge
Saa kufa kwangu unite.


Uniamuru kwako nije.
Na watakatifu wako nikutukuze.


Milele na milele.  Amina.


KUIOMBEA PAROKIA YETU.


K.Ee Bwana Yesu Kristu, ndiwe kichwa cha kanisa lako hapa kwetu. Kwa matumaini tunakuomba kwa ajili ya waamini wote wa parokia yetu.
	


Uwalinde wote walio nyumbani na ugenini.
W.	Usikilize maombi yetu (baada ya kila aya)


K.	Uwaongoze wenye furaha na wenye huzuni
Uwasaidie wenye afya na wagonjwa
Uwavute watu wema na wenye bidii.


Uwaimarishe wote walio dhaifu.
Uwasimamishe walioanguka.


Uwahimize wavivu na wazembe.
uwaonye walio katika hatari ya kupotea.


Uwafariji wazima na wafu.


Atukuzwe Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.
Kama mwanzo na sasa na siku zote na milele milele Amina x 3


Tunaomba hayo kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu.  
Amina.


SALA KWA AJILI YA MWAKA WA KATEKESI

Ee Mungu, ni mapenzi yako kuwa watu wote wapate kuujua ukweli na waokoke. Tunaomba uijaze mioyo yetu na moto wa upendo wako, tupate siku zote kujifunza na kuyaelewa mafundisho ya kweli na matakatifu ya mwanao Yesu Kristu, 

na ya Kanisa lako Takatifu, na kupata kuyaishi na kuyatekeleza maishani mwetu, hadi tuupate uzima wa milele kwako Mbinguni.

Tunakuomba uzidi kumbariki kila mmoja wetu kwa mapaji ya Roho wako Mtakatifu, tunapojibidiisha kuishi kikamilifu imani yetu kwa Kristu. 




Wajalie wote ambao bado hawajaisikia Injili, neema ya kukujua, kukupenda na kukutumikia, katika kweli na roho siku zote za maisha yao.
Tunaomba hayo kwa njia ya Kristu Bwana wetu.




SALA YA UKARIMU KWA MUNGU

Ee Mungu, miguu yangu imesimama madhabahuni mwako nikiwa na shukrani kuu moyoni mwangu kwa ulinzi wako na mema ambayo umetenda maishani mwangu. Wewe ndiye tegemeo langu katika kila jambo. 

Naomba unipe moyo wa bidii kuhudhuria ibada zote katika hekalu hili unapoishi na kutoa Baraka za kipekee. Nijalie moyo wa ukarimu ili niweze kutimiza wajibu wangu kwako na kwa kanisa lako. Naahidi kufanya yote kwa uaminifu. Kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu 
AMINA.

NICENE CREED

I believe in one God,
the Father almighty,
maker of heaven and earth,
of all things visible and invisible.

I believe in one Lord Jesus Christ,
the Only Begotten Son of God,
born of the Father before all ages.

God from God, Light from Light,
true God from true God,
begotten, not made, consubstantial with the Father;
through him all things were made.

For us men and for our salvation
he came down from heaven,
and by the holy spirit was incarnate of the Virgin Mary,
and became man.

For our sake he was crucified under Pontius Pilate,
he suffered death and was buried,
and rose again on the third day
in accordance with the Scriptures.

He ascended into heaven
and is seated at the right hand of the Father.
He will come again in glory
to judge the living and the dead
and his kingdom will have no end.

I believe in the Holy Spirit, the Lord, the giver of Life,
who proceeds from the Father and the Son,
who with the Father and the Son is adored and glorified,
who has spoken through the Prophets.

I believe in one, holy, catholic and apostolic Church.
I confess one Baptism for the forgiveness of sins
and I look forward to the resurrection of the dead
and the life of the world to come.
 Amen

Bwana Mungu wa majeshi;

Utilishe wenye njaa;

Tutakufuata,
Tumrudie Baba yetu;
Wewe ni ukweli,
Utuangazie,
Tusije tukapotoka

Wewe ni uzima,
Sisi tu wangonjwa,
Twakujia utuponye;
Tumwendee nani,
Tukilemewa,

Karibu Bwana, njoo,(*2)
      Shinda pamoja nasi

Bado tu njiani
Yadumu imani,
Tumaini na upendo;
Saa ya kufa kwetu
Tupate kuona Uso wako wa rehema.


Chorus
Karibu Bwana, njoo,(*2)
      Shinda pamoja nasi

Masikio yako yasikie dua zangu

songs.title: CHAIN OF CORRUPTION
songs.lyrics:
ANTI-CORRUPTION COMMITMENT

As a Christian and Kenyan Citizen, wish to commit myself to fight without tiring
the grave evil of Corruption.

I remove my shoes in solidarity with  those who have been deprived  of a  life  by Corruption, those who can't get treatment and medicine because of Corruption,those who can't get employment because ofcorruption.

I remove my shoes in disgust for the  terrible  destruction  the  Sin and curse  of Corruption has done to lives, and the misery of many Kenyans.

I  remove my shoes as a sign of my resolve to do everything in my power to fightthis 
monster like David fought Goliath, with God and with our little strength.

With this external prophetic sign, of mourning  and deprivation, of removing my shoes, I  commit to call to God, to change my heart and those of all Kenyans, to give 
me the courage to become a messenger and warrior against Corruption.

I  Commit myself to fight Corruption at all levels, starting from the grassroots, and to reject any opportunity of being corrupt.I  do so by subscribing my name, and wearing this external sign of this ribbon as a visible sign of my commitment.

I   Commit myself that I   will not receive or give any monetary bribe, or any other bribe of any sort. That I will  not be involved in any illicit and unjust means of obtaining Money,Wealth or any Asset. I  know it is equivalent to stealing.

I Commit myself to avoid the Corruption of unfairly and unjustly favoring any person  or institution  who don't deserve or qualify,  because of belonging  to my Tribe, being a Relative or Friend, at the expense of others.

I  Commit that I  will strive to act honestly and with integrity, in all my duties, and so 
begin the uprooting of Corruption from where I  am. 

I   know this is both my duty as a Christian and also as a Citizen. This ribbon will be a reminder for me.

I Commit myself to truly live up to God's Commandments, and to truly be a Patriotic Kenyan who will make our Country a better place to live and work with equal opportunities.

I  pray that many others may decide to join this campaign and rid our Country once 
and for all, of this great Sickness and Evil of Corruption.

With God we can overcome this giant Monster as David did!
I therefore committo overcoming and fighting Corruption!

I remove my shoes in disgust for the  terrible  destruction  the  Sin and curse  ofCorruption has done to lives, and the misery of many Kenyans.

RENEWAL OF BAPTISMAL PROMISES

Dear Brethren, through the Paschal Mystery we have been buried with Christ in baptism that we may with him in newness of life. And so let us renew the promises of Holy Baptism, which  we once rwalkenounced Satan and his works and promised to serve God in the Holy Catholic Church.

Celebrant:  Do you reject sin, so as to live in the freedom ofthe children of God?

Celebrant: Do you reject all the lure of evil, that is, theft, corruption, fraud, bribery, and all the evils that
dehumanize and degrade the children of God, so that sin may have no mastery over you?

Celebrant:  Do you reject Satan the author and prince of sin, so that you may obey the commandments
ofGod without fail?

Celebrant: Do you   believe in God   the Father Almighty and commit yourself to live by His commandments which you took in the new life of baptism?

Celebrant:  Are you ready to choose God and live, rather than choose the evil actions of corruption and
loose the blessings and friendship with God?

Celebrant: Christ is our light, are you ready to give witness as light and salt ofthe world, and to
suffer by refusing to bribe or accept any sort of bribes?

Celebrant:  Inspired by the Holy Spirit do you commit yourself to follow the law of God and  all licit laws
for love of God and neighbour?

Celebrant:  Guided by the Church are you ready to be a disciple sent to change our society that is rotten
because of corruption and clean it through our sacrifices oftotally   refusing any invitation to 
corruption?

Celebrant: Do you believe in God the Father, Creator of heaven and earth, the Lord ofall creation?

Celebrant:  Do you believe in Jesus Christ his son and was born ofthe Virgin Mary, suffered and crucified,
through the corrupt acts ofJudas and the leaders, died to     redeem us from the corruption of 
sin and rose on the third day from the dead to conquer sin, and overcome evil?

Celebrant:  Do you believe in the Holy Spirit, the paraclete and the giver of life, with whose power we are
sent to renew the face ofthe world, uproot evil, and make it  holy?

Celebrant:  Do you believe in the Holy Catholic Church, the communion of saints, the forgiveness of sins
including those of corruption, the resurrection ofthe body  and life everlasting?

The celebrant concludes:
And may Almighty God, the Father, our Lord Jesus Christ who has given us new birth by water and Holy 
Spirit and bestowed on us forgiveness of our sins, keep us by his grace, in Christ Jesus our Lord, for eternal 
life.

ALL: Amen

KUWEKA UPYA NADHIRI YA UBATIZO.

Ndugu zangu, kupitia kwa fumbo la Pasaka, tumezikwa pamoja na Kristo katika ubatizo iii tuweze kutembea pamoja naye katika uzima  mpya. Ndiposa  nawaomba  tuweke upya nadhiri ya Ubatizo Mtakatifu, ambapo  tulimkataa shetani na kazi zake zote na kuahidi  kumtumikia Mungu  katika 
Kanisa Takatifu Katoliki.

Unamkataa shetani iii uishi kwenye uhuru wa wana wa Mungu?
Ninamkataa.

Unaikataa  mivuto  yote  ya  uovu,  nayo ni wizi,  ufisadi,  ulaghai,  rushwa  na maovu yote 
yanayowanyima haki na kuwadunisha wana wa Mungu, iii usitawaliwe kamwe na dhambi? 
Ninaikataa.

Unamkataa shetani, asili na mwana mfalme wa dhambi iii uzitii amri za Mungu kila wakati?
Ninamkataa.

Unamwamini Mungu Baba mwenye uwezo wote na kujitolea kuishi ukizingatia amri zote 
kama ulivyoahidi ulipopata uzima mpya kwa ubatizo?
Ninamwamini.

Uko tayari  kumchagua Mungu  iii  uishi milele,  badala ya kuchagua maovu ya ufisadi  na 
hivyo basi kupoteza baraka na urafiki na Mungu?
Niko tayari.

Mwangaza wetu Kristo yu tayari  kuteseka kwa kukataa  hongo. Uko tayari  kutoa Ushahidi 
ukiwa mwanga na chumvi ya dunia?
Niko tayari.

Ukifunguliwa  mlango wa heri  wa Roho  Mtakatifu,  unaahidi kufuata  sheria  ya Mungu na 
sheria zote halali za kumpenda Mungu najirani yako?
Ninajitolea.

Ukiongozwa na Kanisa, uko tayari kuwa mfuasi na kutumwa kuibadilishajamii iliyooza kwa 
sababu ya ufisadi? Uisafishe kwa kujitolea kwetu kwa dhati kukataa kuvutwa na kushiriki 
katika ufisadi wowote?
Niko tayari.

Unamwamini Mungu Baba, Muumba wa mbingu na ardhi, Bwana wa vyote vilivyoumbwa?
Ninamwamini.

Unamwamini mwanawe Yesu Kristo, aliyezaliwa na Bikira Maria, akateswa na kusulubiwa, kutokana  na matendo ya kifisadi ya Yuda, akafa iii atukomboa kutoka kwa ufisadi wa 
dhambi, akafufuka siku ya tatu na kushinda dhambi na kuangamiza maovu?
Ninamwamini.

Unamwamini  Roho Mtakatifu,  Bwana mleta  uzima, ambaye kwa nguvu zake tumetumwa 
kuupatia ulimwengu sura mpya na kuitakasa?
Ninamwamini.

Unaliamini  Kanisa moja, Takatifu,   Katoliki, la mitume na watakatifu wote, maondoleo ya dhambi, ikiwa ni pamoja na dhambi za ufisadi, ufufuko wa wafu na uzima wa milele ijayo? 
Ninaamini

Mhudumu anahitimisha:Mungu Mwenyezi,Baba wa Bwana  wetu  Yesu Kristo,ambaye ametupa uzima mpya kwa maji na Roho Mtakatifu, na kutusamehe dhambi zetu,atulinde kwa neema yake,kwa Yesu Kristo Bwana wetu, kwa uzima wa milele.

Wote: Amina
Ninapinga Ufisadi

Ukiongozwa na Kanisa, uko tayari kuwa mfuasi na kutumwa kuibadilishajamii iliyooza kwa 
sababu ya ufisadi? Uisafishe kwa kujitolea kwetu kwa dhati kukataa kuvutwa na kushiriki 
katika ufisadi wowote?
Niko tayari.

Unamwamini Mungu Baba, Muumba wa mbingu na ardhi, Bwana wa vyote vilivyoumbwa?
Ninamwamini.

Unamwamini mwanawe Yesu Kristo, aliyezaliwa na Bikira Maria, akateswa na kusulubiwa, kutokana  na matendo ya kifisadi ya Yuda, akafa iii atukomboa kutoka kwa ufisadi wa 
dhambi, akafufuka siku ya tatu na kushinda dhambi na kuangamiza maovu?
Ninamwamini.

Unamwamini  Roho Mtakatifu,  Bwana mleta  uzima, ambaye kwa nguvu zake tumetumwa 
kuupatia ulimwengu sura mpya na kuitakasa?
Ninamwamini.

Unaliamini  Kanisa moja, Takatifu,   Katoliki, la mitume na watakatifu wote, maondoleo ya dhambi, ikiwa ni pamoja na dhambi za ufisadi, ufufuko wa wafu na uzima wa milele ijayo? 
Ninaamini

Mhudumu anahitimisha:Mungu Mwenyezi,Baba wa Bwana  wetu  Yesu Kristo,ambaye ametupa uzima mpya kwa maji na Roho Mtakatifu, na kutusamehe dhambi zetu,atulinde kwa neema yake,kwa Yesu Kristo Bwana wetu, kwa uzima wa milele.

Wote: Amina
Ninapinga Ufisadi

TUKATE MINYORORO YA UFISADI

Baba yetu uliye mbinguni,umekuwa ukijali viumbe vyako ili tuishi kulingana na mapenzi yako.

umeibariki nchi yetu kwa wenye vipawa vingi na kutupatia mali asili za kutumiwa kwa sifa na utukufu wako na kwa manufaa ya kila Mkenya.

Tunahuzunishwa sana na utumiaji mbaya wa hizi zawadi na Baraka zako kwetu kupitia kwa tendo la ufisadi ambalo limesababishia watu kwa wengi wa njaa,magonjwa,

kuwanyima makao na kuwafurahisha makwao,kuwaacha wengi bilaelimu na kinga yoyote maishani.

Baba ni wewe pekee uwezaye kutuponya kutokana na ugonjwa huu ambao hatima yake ni mauti.

Tunakusihi uguse Maisha yet una ya viongozi wetu,ili tutambue uovu wa ufisadi na kujitahidi kikamilifu kuliangamiza jinamizi hilo mbaya.Kwa raia yeyote ambaye amejipatia chochote kifisadi na kukurejelea.

Tunakuomba utupe sisi raia wanaomcha Mung una viongozi wanaotujali na ambao watatuongoza katika njia ya amani,haki,ufanisi,maendeleo na la muhimu Zaidi upendo.

TUNAOMBA HAYO KUPITIA KWA KRISTO BWANA WETU
EE BWANA TUNAKUOMBA UTUSIKIE

LET  US  BREAK THE CHAIN  OF CORRUPTION

Father in heaven, You  always provide for  all your creatures, so  that they may live as you have always willed.  

You  have  blessed our country Kenya with rich human and natural resources to  be used in honour and glory and for the well being of every Kenyan. 

We  are deeply sorrowful for the wrong use of these your gifts and blessings through the act of corruption, as a result of which many of our people are  hungry, sick, homeless and displaced, ignorant and defenceless.  

Father, You  alone can heal us of this sickness which leads to  death. We  humbly beg you, touch our lives and those of our leaders so  that we  may realise the evil of corruption and work hard to eliminate it.  

For any citizen who has acquired anything through corrupt means, Lord, give him or her, the spirit of courage to  make a restitution and come back to  you. 

Raise up for  us God-fearing citizens and leaders who care for  us and who will lead us in the path of peace, justice, prosperity, progress and above all, Love. 

We  make our prayer through Christ our Lord.
Lord  graciously hear us.

songs.title: CORRUPTION
songs.lyrics:
ANTI-CORRUPTION COMMITMENT

As a Christian and Kenyan Citizen, wish to commit myself to fight without tiring
the grave evil of Corruption.

I remove my shoes in solidarity with  those who have been deprived  of a  life  by Corruption, those who can't get treatment and medicine because of Corruption,those who can't get employment because ofcorruption.

I remove my shoes in disgust for the  terrible  destruction  the  Sin and curse  of Corruption has done to lives, and the misery of many Kenyans.

I  remove my shoes as a sign of my resolve to do everything in my power to fightthis 
monster like David fought Goliath, with God and with our little strength.

With this external prophetic sign, of mourning  and deprivation, of removing my shoes, I  commit to call to God, to change my heart and those of all Kenyans, to give 
me the courage to become a messenger and warrior against Corruption.

I  Commit myself to fight Corruption at all levels, starting from the grassroots, and to reject any opportunity of being corrupt.I  do so by subscribing my name, and wearing this external sign of this ribbon as a visible sign of my commitment.

I   Commit myself that I   will not receive or give any monetary bribe, or any other bribe of any sort. That I will  not be involved in any illicit and unjust means of obtaining Money,Wealth or any Asset. I  know it is equivalent to stealing.

I Commit myself to avoid the Corruption of unfairly and unjustly favoring any person  or institution  who don't deserve or qualify,  because of belonging  to my Tribe, being a Relative or Friend, at the expense of others.

I  Commit that I  will strive to act honestly and with integrity, in all my duties, and so 
begin the uprooting of Corruption from where I  am. 

I   know this is both my duty as a Christian and also as a Citizen. This ribbon will be a reminder for me.

I Commit myself to truly live up to God's Commandments, and to truly be a Patriotic Kenyan who will make our Country a better place to live and work with equal opportunities.

I  pray that many others may decide to join this campaign and rid our Country once 
and for all, of this great Sickness and Evil of Corruption.

With God we can overcome this giant Monster as David did!
I therefore committo overcoming and fighting Corruption!

I remove my shoes in disgust for the  terrible  destruction  the  Sin and curse  ofCorruption has done to lives, and the misery of many Kenyans.

RENEWAL OF BAPTISMAL PROMISES

Dear Brethren, through the Paschal Mystery we have been buried with Christ in baptism that we may with him in newness of life. And so let us renew the promises of Holy Baptism, which  we once rwalkenounced Satan and his works and promised to serve God in the Holy Catholic Church.

Celebrant:  Do you reject sin, so as to live in the freedom ofthe children of God?

Celebrant: Do you reject all the lure of evil, that is, theft, corruption, fraud, bribery, and all the evils that
dehumanize and degrade the children of God, so that sin may have no mastery over you?

Celebrant:  Do you reject Satan the author and prince of sin, so that you may obey the commandments
ofGod without fail?

Celebrant: Do you   believe in God   the Father Almighty and commit yourself to live by His commandments which you took in the new life of baptism?

Celebrant:  Are you ready to choose God and live, rather than choose the evil actions of corruption and
loose the blessings and friendship with God?

Celebrant: Christ is our light, are you ready to give witness as light and salt ofthe world, and to
suffer by refusing to bribe or accept any sort of bribes?

Celebrant:  Inspired by the Holy Spirit do you commit yourself to follow the law of God and  all licit laws
for love of God and neighbour?

Celebrant:  Guided by the Church are you ready to be a disciple sent to change our society that is rotten
because of corruption and clean it through our sacrifices oftotally   refusing any invitation to 
corruption?

Celebrant: Do you believe in God the Father, Creator of heaven and earth, the Lord ofall creation?

Celebrant:  Do you believe in Jesus Christ his son and was born ofthe Virgin Mary, suffered and crucified,
through the corrupt acts ofJudas and the leaders, died to     redeem us from the corruption of 
sin and rose on the third day from the dead to conquer sin, and overcome evil?

Celebrant:  Do you believe in the Holy Spirit, the paraclete and the giver of life, with whose power we are
sent to renew the face ofthe world, uproot evil, and make it  holy?

Celebrant:  Do you believe in the Holy Catholic Church, the communion of saints, the forgiveness of sins
including those of corruption, the resurrection ofthe body  and life everlasting?

The celebrant concludes:
And may Almighty God, the Father, our Lord Jesus Christ who has given us new birth by water and Holy 
Spirit and bestowed on us forgiveness of our sins, keep us by his grace, in Christ Jesus our Lord, for eternal 
life.

ALL: Amen

KUWEKA UPYA NADHIRI YA UBATIZO.

Ndugu zangu, kupitia kwa fumbo la Pasaka, tumezikwa pamoja na Kristo katika ubatizo iii tuweze kutembea pamoja naye katika uzima  mpya. Ndiposa  nawaomba  tuweke upya nadhiri ya Ubatizo Mtakatifu, ambapo  tulimkataa shetani na kazi zake zote na kuahidi  kumtumikia Mungu  katika 
Kanisa Takatifu Katoliki.

Unamkataa shetani iii uishi kwenye uhuru wa wana wa Mungu?
Ninamkataa.

Unaikataa  mivuto  yote  ya  uovu,  nayo ni wizi,  ufisadi,  ulaghai,  rushwa  na maovu yote 
yanayowanyima haki na kuwadunisha wana wa Mungu, iii usitawaliwe kamwe na dhambi? 
Ninaikataa.

Unamkataa shetani, asili na mwana mfalme wa dhambi iii uzitii amri za Mungu kila wakati?
Ninamkataa.

Unamwamini Mungu Baba mwenye uwezo wote na kujitolea kuishi ukizingatia amri zote 
kama ulivyoahidi ulipopata uzima mpya kwa ubatizo?
Ninamwamini.

Uko tayari  kumchagua Mungu  iii  uishi milele,  badala ya kuchagua maovu ya ufisadi  na 
hivyo basi kupoteza baraka na urafiki na Mungu?
Niko tayari.

Mwangaza wetu Kristo yu tayari  kuteseka kwa kukataa  hongo. Uko tayari  kutoa Ushahidi 
ukiwa mwanga na chumvi ya dunia?
Niko tayari.

Ukifunguliwa  mlango wa heri  wa Roho  Mtakatifu,  unaahidi kufuata  sheria  ya Mungu na 
sheria zote halali za kumpenda Mungu najirani yako?
Ninajitolea.

Ukiongozwa na Kanisa, uko tayari kuwa mfuasi na kutumwa kuibadilishajamii iliyooza kwa 
sababu ya ufisadi? Uisafishe kwa kujitolea kwetu kwa dhati kukataa kuvutwa na kushiriki 
katika ufisadi wowote?
Niko tayari.

Unamwamini Mungu Baba, Muumba wa mbingu na ardhi, Bwana wa vyote vilivyoumbwa?
Ninamwamini.

Unamwamini mwanawe Yesu Kristo, aliyezaliwa na Bikira Maria, akateswa na kusulubiwa, kutokana  na matendo ya kifisadi ya Yuda, akafa iii atukomboa kutoka kwa ufisadi wa 
dhambi, akafufuka siku ya tatu na kushinda dhambi na kuangamiza maovu?
Ninamwamini.

Unamwamini  Roho Mtakatifu,  Bwana mleta  uzima, ambaye kwa nguvu zake tumetumwa 
kuupatia ulimwengu sura mpya na kuitakasa?
Ninamwamini.

Unaliamini  Kanisa moja, Takatifu,   Katoliki, la mitume na watakatifu wote, maondoleo ya dhambi, ikiwa ni pamoja na dhambi za ufisadi, ufufuko wa wafu na uzima wa milele ijayo? 
Ninaamini

Mhudumu anahitimisha:Mungu Mwenyezi,Baba wa Bwana  wetu  Yesu Kristo,ambaye ametupa uzima mpya kwa maji na Roho Mtakatifu, na kutusamehe dhambi zetu,atulinde kwa neema yake,kwa Yesu Kristo Bwana wetu, kwa uzima wa milele.

Wote: Amina
Ninapinga Ufisadi

songs.title: EASTER
songs.lyrics:
FIRST  READING
    Acts 10:34a, 37-43
We ate and drank with him after he rose from the dead.
A reading from the Acts of the Apostles

In those days: Peter opened his mouth and said,
“You know the word which was proclaimed throughout all Judea, beginning from Galilee after the baptism which John preached:

 how God anointed Jesus of Nazareth with the Holy Spirit and with power; how he went about doing good and healing all that were oppressed by the devil,

 for God was with him.  And we are witnesses to all that he did both in the country of the Jews and in Jerusalem. They pout him to death by hanging him on a tree;

 but God raised him on the third day and made him manifest;  not to all the people but to us who were chosen by God as witnesses,

 who ate and drank with him after he rose from the dead. And he commanded us to preach to the people,  and to testify that he is the one ordained by God to be judge 

of the living and the dead. To him all the prophets bear witness that everyone who believes in him receives forgiveness of sins through his name.”
The word of the Lord.

RESPONSORIAL PSALM
Psalms 118:1-2, 16ab-17, 22-23 (R.24)


R. This is the day the Lord has made;
let us rejoice in it and be glad.


Give praise to the Lord, for he is good;
His mercy endures forever.
Let the house of Israel say,
“His mercy endures forever.” (R)


“The Lord’s right hand has done mighty deeds: his right hand is exalted. The Lord’s right hand has done mighty deeds.” I shall not die, I shall live And recount the deeds of the Lord. (R)


The stone that the builders rejected
Has become the cornerstone.
By the Lord has this been done,
a marvel in our eyes. [R]
SECOND READING                                                                                        1 Corinthians 5:6b-8
Cleanse out the old leaven that you may be new dough.



Do you not know that a little leaven leavens all the dough? Cleanse out the old leaven that you may be new dough, as you really are unleavened. For Christ, our Paschal Lamb 

has been sacrificed. Let us, therefore, celebrate the festival, not with the old leaven, the leaven of malice and evil, but with the unleavened bread of sincerity and truth.
The word of the Lord.




 SECOND READING                                                                                       Colossians 3:1-4
Seek the things that are above, where Christ is.


Brethren: If you have been raised with Christ, seek the things that are above, where Christ is, seated at the right hand of God. Set your minds on things that are above, not on things 

that are on earth. For you have died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God. When Christ who is our life appears, then you also will appear with him in Glory.
    The word of the Lord.

ALLELUIA                                                                                         1 Corinthians 5:7b, 8a
Alleluia. Alleluia.
Christ our Paschal Lamb, has been sacrificed; let us, therefore, celebrate the festival in the Lord.
W.Alleluia.
 

SEKWENSIA

Kristo, paska yetu, amechinjwa sadaka.
Tuile karamuye na tuimbe aleluya.

1.Aliyejitoa sadaka ya Paska
Wakristo wamtolee sadaka ya sifa

2.Mwanakondoo amewakomboa kondoo:
Kristo asiye na dhambi
amewapatanisha na Baba watu wenye dhambi.

3.Mauti na uzima vimeshindana ajabu:
Mkuu wa uzima aliyekufa, atawala mzima.

4.Utuambie Maria, uliona nini njiani?
Niliona kaburi la Kristo mzima,
Na utukufu wa mwenye aliyekufa.

5.Mashahidi ni Malaika, leso ya uso na mavazi.
Kristo tumaini langu kafufuka: atawatangulia Galilaya.

6.Twajua Kristo amefufuka kweli katika wafu:
ewe mfalme mshindaji, utuhurumie. 
Amina. Aleluya
 

GOSPEL                                                                                                           John 20 :1-9
He must rise from the dead.


On the first day of the week, Mary Magdalene came to the tomb early, while it was still dark, and saw that the stone had been taken away from the tomb. So, she ran, and went 

to Simon Peter and the other disciple, the one whom Jesus loved and said to them, “They have taken the Lord out of the tomb, and we do not know where they have laid 

him.” Peter then came out with the other disciple, and they went towards the tomb. They both ran, but the other disciple outran Peter and reached the tomb first; and 

stooping to look in, he saw the linen cloths lying there, but he did not go in. Then Simon Peter came, following him, and went into the tomb; he saw the linen cloths lying, and 

the napkin, which had been on his head, not lying with the linen cloths but rolled up in a place by itself. Then the other disciple, who reached the tomb first, also went in, and he 

saw and believed; for as yet they did not know the Scripture, that he must rise from the dead.
  The Gospel of the Lord.
