2. Fedha na mazao yetu ya mashambani uvibariki uvipokee




3. Twakutolea pia nazo nafsi zetu uzibariki uzipokee

songs.title: SALA
songs.lyrics:
SALA KABLA YA KOMUNIO


Ee Yesu, mkate wa mbingu, ninakututamani.
Uje kwangu uliye uzima na heri yangu.


Uje, chakula cha roho yangu, unitie imara.
Uje, Mwanakondoo wa Mungu, uondoe dhambi zangu.


Uje, mganga wa roho, uponye udhaifu wangu.
Uje, ee Yesu, uungane nami, Amina.


SALA BAADA YA KOMUNIO


SALA YA MTAKATIFU INYASIO


Roho ya Kristu initakase.
Mwili wa Kristu uniokoe.


Damu ya Kristu inichangamshe.
Maji ya ubavu wa Kristu yanioshe.


Mateso ya Kristu nguvu yanizidishie.
Ee Yesu mwema, unisikilize.


Katika madonda yako unifiche.
Usikubali nitengane nawe.


Na adui mwovu unikinge
Saa kufa kwangu unite.


Uniamuru kwako nije.
Na watakatifu wako nikutukuze.


Milele na milele.  Amina.


KUIOMBEA PAROKIA YETU.


K.Ee Bwana Yesu Kristu, ndiwe kichwa cha kanisa lako hapa kwetu. Kwa matumaini tunakuomba kwa ajili ya waamini wote wa parokia yetu.
 


Uwalinde wote walio nyumbani na ugenini.
W. Usikilize maombi yetu (baada ya kila aya)


K. Uwaongoze wenye furaha na wenye huzuni
Uwasaidie wenye afya na wagonjwa
Uwavute watu wema na wenye bidii.


Uwaimarishe wote walio dhaifu.
Uwasimamishe walioanguka.


Uwahimize wavivu na wazembe.
uwaonye walio katika hatari ya kupotea.


Uwafariji wazima na wafu.


Atukuzwe Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.
Kama mwanzo na sasa na siku zote na milele milele Amina x 3


Tunaomba hayo kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu.  
Amina.

songs.title: SALA 2
songs.lyrics:
SALA KABLA YA KOMUNIO


Ee Yesu, mkate wa mbingu, ninakututamani.
Uje kwangu uliye uzima na heri yangu.


Uje, chakula cha roho yangu, unitie imara.
Uje, Mwanakondoo wa Mungu, uondoe dhambi zangu.


Uje, mganga wa roho, uponye udhaifu wangu.
Uje, ee Yesu, uungune nami, Amina.


SALA BAADA YA KOMUNYO


KUABUDU


Ee Yesu wangu, nakuabudu moyoni mwangu ulimo, nakuungama ndiwe Bwana wangu na Mungu wangu, Mungu-Mtu na Mkombozi wangu.


Sifai mimi kukuabudu vema unavyostahili; nawaomba watakatifu na malaika wa mbinguni wakuabudu pamoja nami.


MAPENDO


Ee Yesu uliyejaa wema na mapendo, umekuja m oyoni mwangu.


Wewe Mwumba Mwenyezi umefika kwa kiumbe chako; wewe Mkombozi umefika kwa mtu mkosefu.


Umekuja kunipa hakika ya mapendo yako.  Nakupenda, Mungu wangu. Unitie mapendo, nikupende kama unavyostahili kupendwa.


SHUKRANI


Ee Yesu, nakushukuru sana kwani umenitendea makuu: umenilisha mwili wako mtukufu, umeungana nami kabisa.


Umeniongezea uzima rohoni mwangu; umenipa nguvu mpya ya kutenda mema; umenisaidia katika udhaifu wangu; nitakurudishia nini?


Umenipa moyo wako, nami nakupa moyo wangu na akili yangu, kazi zangu na mateso yangu, nafsi yangu yote.


Najitolea kuwa kitu chako kabisa.  Yesu wangu mimi ni mali yako katika maisha na saa ya kufa.


MAOMBI


Ee Yesu, mkarimu kwa wote wanaokuomba.  Uitunze neema yako, niendelee kukupenda.


Umetakasa mwili na roho.


Nakuomba ulimi wangu uliokugusa usiseme maneno mabaya: moyo wangu uliokupokea usitamani maovu; mwili wangu unamokaa ukutumikie kwa matendo ya haki.


Unilinde katika hatari na vishawishi;  unisaidie kuvumilia taabu na masumbuko; unizidishie upendo wako nipate kufanana nawe zaidi.


MAOMBEZI
Ee Yesu, mchungaji mwema, nakuomba uwatendee mema waliounganika nawe.


Ulinde kanisa lako lote, uwafanyizie vema jamaa zangu, rafiki na wafadhili, wakubwa na wanyonge.


Uwafariji maskini na wazee, uwainue wagonjwa na wanaozimia, uwapokee kwako roho za marehemu.


Ubariki nyumba zetu, wanyama wetu na mashamba yetu.  Utujalie mahitaji ya maisha, afya njema na riziki za kutosha.


Uwarudishie ndugu wote waliojitenga nawe waungane na kundi lako moja.  Na amani yako ikae na watu wote. Amina.


SALA YA MTAKATIFU INYASIO


Roho ya Kristu initakase.
Mwili wa Kristu uniokoe.


Damu ya Kristu inichangamshe.
Maji ya ubavu wa Kristu yanioshe.


Mateso ya Kristu nguvu yanizidishie.
Ee Yesu mwema, unisikilize.


Katika madonda yako unifiche.
Usikubali nitengane nawe.


Na adui mwovu unikinge
Saa kufa kwangu unite.


Uniamuru kwako nije.
Na watakatifu wako nikutukuze.


Milele na milele.  Amina.


KUIOMBEA PAROKIA YETU.


K.Ee Bwana Yesu Kristu, ndiwe kichwa cha kanisa lako hapa kwetu. Kwa matumaini tunakuomba kwa ajili ya waamini wote wa parokia yetu.
	


Uwalinde wote walio nyumbani na ugenini.
W.	Usikilize maombi yetu (baada ya kila aya)


K.	Uwaongoze wenye furaha na wenye huzuni
Uwavute watu wema na wenye bidii.


Uwaimarishe wote walio dhaifu.
Uwasimamishe walioanguka.


Uwahimize wavivu na wazembe.
uwaonye walio katika hatari ya kupotea.


Uwafariji wazima na wafu.


Atukuzwe Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.
Kama mwanzo na sasa na siku zote na milele milele Amina x 3


Tunaomba hayo kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu.  Amina.

songs.title: SALA KWA AJILI YA NCHI YETU YA KENYA
songs.lyrics:
SALA KWA AJILI YA NCHI YETU YA KENYA

Kiongozi: Ee Mungu Mwenyezi wa milele, Baba wa mataifa yote na wa watu wote utuangalie kwa huruma sisi watu wako wa Kenya. Kwa baraka yako utuwezeshe kuishi maisha mema kama iwapasavyo wana wako. 


Wote: Ubariki nchi yetu. (Baada ya kila Jungu) 


Kiongozi: Uwaangaze watawala wetu. Sheria wanazotunga zilingane na sheria yako wewe uliyetuumba kwa ajili yako, tena zitusaidie kupata manufaa ya hapa duniani. 


Wote: Ubariki nchi yetu
 


Kiongozi: Uwajalie watu wote kipaji cha amani. Utupe hekima ya kutafuta ukweli na haki katika mambo yote na kuishi kadiri ya amri zako. 

Wote: Ubariki nchi yetu 


Kiongozi: Uwashe moto wa mapendo yako mioyoni mwetu. Mapendo hayo yatusaidie kushinda utengano, ushindani na chuki ya ukabila. 

Wote: Ubariki nchi yetu 


Kiongozi: Utuunganishe sisi sote kwa mwungano wa kidugu, tupate kwa msaada wa neema yako kuwa na umoja katika wewe, Baba wa wote.  


Wote: Ubariki nchi yetu


Kiongozi: Ubariki taifa letu, liweze kusitawi na kushika amani na mataifa mengine.

Wote: Ubariki nchi yetu 


Kiongozi: Uwaongoze watumishi wote wa serikali, ili watimize wajibu na kazi zao sawasawa.

Wote: Ubariki nchi yetu


Kiongozi: Uwasaidie raia wote wa Kenya kujipatia hali njema, haki na heshima. Utufadhilie kufikia kipeo ulichotutayarishia, yaani kuwa raia katika ufalme wa Mbinguni, pale unapoishi na kutawala daima na milele. 


Wote: Ubariki nchi yetu


TUOMBE: Ee Mungu Mwenyezi wa milele, ndiwe uliye na uwezo juu ya mioyo ya watu wote, na unayashikilia mataifa yote duniani. Tunakuomba kwa wema wako usaidie nchi yetu ya Kenya, 

kwa hisani yako uwaongoze wote wenye mamlaka ya serikali na ya Kanisa Pamoja na raia wote, wazidi kuzingatia uadilifu, uwajibikaji, kazi njema, wawe wasikivu na kujali mahitaji ya raia wote. 

Utujalie amani, haki, umoja, ukarimu na ukweli, ili tuishi katika mapendo halisi. Wote wafanye kazi kwa bidii. 

Fukuza ufisadi na hali ya utumiaji mbaya wa rasilimali ili kuwe na rasilimali za kutosha kustawisha nchi yetu katika nyanja zote.

Uhai uzidi kulindwa na kila mmoja aishi katika undugu na ujirani mwema.
Tunaomba haya kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu.
Wote: Amina.�

songs.title: SALA YA JUBILEI 2025
songs.lyrics:
SALA YA JUBILEI

Baba yetu uliye Mbinguni, imani uliyotupa kupitia Mwanao Yesu Kristo, ndugu yetu, 

na mwanga wa upendo, unaowashwa mioyoni mwetu na Roho Mtakatifu, 

ufufue ndani yetu tumaini lenye baraka la ujio wa Ufalme wako. Neema yako itubadilishe tuwe wapanzi wasiochoka wa mbegu za Injili. 

Mbegu hizo na zibadilike kutoka ndani ya ubinadamu na ulimwengu wote katika matarajio ya hakika ya Mbingu mpya na dunia mpya,

 wakati, nguvu za uovu zinaposhindwa, utukufu wako utang'aa milele.

Neema ya Jubilei iamshe tena ndani yetu, Mahujaji wa Matumaini, wenye kutamani hazina za mbinguni. 

Neema hiyo ieneze furaha na amani Mkombozi wetu duniani kote. 

Kwako Mungu wetu, uhimidiwe milele, utukufu na sifa ziwe kwako daima na milele.
Ee Bwana Twakuomb�a

songs.title: SALA YA KUMWOMBA MTAKATIFU YOSEFU
songs.lyrics:
Ee Yosefu Mwenye heri, tunakimbilia kwako, katika masumbuko yetu; na kisha omba shime, ya mchumba wako mtakatifu, tunaomba pia kwa matumaini, usimamizi wako. Kwa ajili ya mapendo,

uliyompenda Bikira mtakatifu, mzazi wa Mungu, na kwa ajili, ya kumtunza Mtoto Yesu, twakuomba sana,utuangalie kwa wako, sisi tuliokuwa, fungu Iake Yesu Kristu, tukakombolewa, kwa damu yake.

Utusimamie, katika masumbuko yetu, kwa enzi na shime yako. Ee mlinzi amini, wa jamaa takatifu, uwakinge watoto wateule, wa Yesu Kristu. Ee Baba, uliyetupenda mno, utuepushe na kilema chochote,

cha madanganyo na upotevu. Ee kinga yetu mwezaji, utusimamie huko juu mbinguni ulipo, tunaposhindana na wenye nguvu, wakaao gizani, kama vile siku za kale, ukamwopoa Mtoto Yesu,'

katika hatari ya kuuawa, na leo hivi, likinge kanisa lako takatifu, katika mitego ya adui,.na katika shida yote; mtunze daima, kila mmoja.

wetu, kwa mfano wako, ili tupate na msaada wako, kukaa na utakatifu, maishani mwetu,.kufa kifo chema na kupata mbinguni, makao ya raha milele. Amina.

songs.title: SALA YA KUSHEREKEA  PADRE ANTHONY KAISER
songs.lyrics:
SALA YA KUSHEREKEA
JUBILEI YA
PADRE ANTHONY KAISER

Ee Mungu Baba yetu wa Milele, ulituumba kila mmoja
wetu kwa mfano na sura yako.

Tunakushukuru kwa baraka zako nyingi maishani mwetu na kwa kutujalia miito mbalimbali
ya kukutumikia wewe ndani ya wenzetu.

Ulimwita na kumteua mtumishi wako
Padre Anthony Kaiser alihudumie taifa lako
kwa ujasiri na uhodari mwingi.

Tumezitambua juhudi zake huku akiangaziwa na Neno lako kutoka kitabu cha Nabii Mika. “Ee Mwanadamu umejulishwa yaliyo mema,


na mambo Bwana anayotaka kwako si kitu
kingine isipokuwa kushika haki na kupenda uaminifu na kwenda kwa unyenyekevu pamoja na Mungu wako.”

Mbegu njema aliyoipanda ya kutenda na kulinda haki ya wanadamu, izidi kukua popote pale, ili watu wako wote wapate kuishi kwa haki,


amani na furaha siku zote.Fukuza maovu yote kati yetu kama vile dhuluma na unyanyasaji, ufisadi, ukandamizaji wa
haki za Watoto, yatima, 

wajane na masikini.
Tunakuomba ewe Mwenyezi Mungu, uzidi
kuwaangazia wote katika jamii watambue umuhimu wa kuishi maisha ya haki,


uwajibikaji, kuheshimiana, kupendana na kutendeana
mema siku zote kama wanao wapenzi.

Yajalie mataifa yote amani na ustawi wa kweli.
Tunaomba haya kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu.
Amina

songs.title: SALA YA KUWEKA KIAPO KWA UONGOZI WA KANISA LA MUNGU
songs.lyrics:
SALA YA KUWEKA KIAPO KWA UONGOZI WA KANISA LA MUNGU


Ee Mungu, ninakushukuru kwa kuniumba kwa mfano na sura yako na kuniweka 
hapa duniani ili siku zote nikazidi kukutumikia wewe ndani ya watu wako, 
maisha yangu yote hadi uzima wa milele nawe mbinguni. 


Ninakuomba unijaze na mapaji ya Roho wako Mtakatifu ili nizidi kukutumikia 
kwa uaminifu, furaha, upole, unyenyekevu, mapendo na kwa uhodari na 
ushupavu ndani ya hawa wapendwa wako walio nichagua kwa nafasi hii.



Niwezeshe siku zote kwa nguvu ya neema yako, nijitolee kikamilifu kuhudhuria 
mikutano yote vyema, nichangie kwa hali na mali kwa mshikamano mwema wa 
Imani, kwa maendeleo yote ya imani, kijamii na kiutu. 



Wajalie wote walionichagua wazidi kuwa wasikivu na wenye uwajibikaji, 
maana ni wewe unatenda kazi zote njema kupitia sisi unaotupenda. 
Zidi kutubariki kila mmoja wetu kwa wingi wa amani, mapendo na matumaini. 




Wajalie wote kupitia uongozi wetu unaoangaziwa na Neno lako Takatifu, waje 
katika kweli yako na waishi siku zote katika kukujua, kukupenda na 
kukutumikia, ili ulimwengu mzima ujawe na Roho ya Injili yako Takatifu.
Tunaomba haya kwa njia ya Kristu Bwana na Mkombozi wetu, 
Wote: Amina

songs.title: Sala ya Mt. Monika
songs.lyrics:
Sala ya Bikira Maria


Ee Bikira imakulata, uliyekingwa dhambi ya asili na dhambi zote zingine, uliyeelekeza moyo wako safi kwa Mungu, 

na uliyetimiza daima mapenzi yake tu. Basi uniombee nipate neema ya kuchukia dhambi kwa moyo wote na kufuata mfano wako bora wa kumtii Mungu katika mambo yote, 


saa ya kufa kwangu unipeleke safi na bila kosa mbele ya Bwana mwamuzi wangu. 
Amina.


Sala ya Mt. Monika


Ee Mungu, mfariji kwa wenye uchungu, mkombozi kwa wenye kutumaini kwako, 

uliyepokea kwa wema machozi ya Mt. Monika mwenye heri kwa kumgeuza mwanaye Augustino, utujalie kwa maombezi ya hao wawili, 

tupate kuzililia dhambi zetu, na kupata rehema ya neema yako kwa ajili ya Bwana wetu Yesu Kristu. 
Amina.

Sala ya kujitolea kuwa mtumishi mwaminifu wa Bwana

Ee Yesu Mkombozi wetu, ututazame sisi tulionyenyekea mbele ya Altare yako. Twataka kuwa mali yako na kupata kuungana zaidi nawe,

kila mmo- ja wetu anajitolea leo kwa hiari yake kuwa mtumishi wako mwaminifu. 

Ee Bwana, tunapenda kuwa waaminifu katika maisha yetu ya kikristu, 

tukifuata mfano bora wa Bikira Maria na wa Mtakatifu Monika walio waombezi na wasimamizi wa shirika letu. 

Tudumishe katika Imani, Mapendo na Matumaini; ili tuwe kielelezo katika familia zetu, shirika
letu na kwa Kanisa nzima. 

Nawe Bikira Maria Mama wa Mungu na mama wa Kanisa utuombee kwa Mwanao na pia ulisimamie shirika letu la aki- na mama hapa Parokiani mwetu.

songs.title: SALA YA MT. YOSEFU
songs.lyrics:
SALA YA MT. YOSEFU

Ee Mt. Yosefu mwenye heri, tunakimbilia kwako katika masumbuko yetu, na kisha omba shime ya Mchumba wako Mtakatifu, tunaomba pia kwa matumaini usimamizi wako.

 Kwa ajili ya mapendo uliyompenda Bikira Mtakatifu Mzazi wa Mungu, na kwa ajili ya kumtunza Mtoto Yesu, twakuomba sana, 

utuangalie kwa wema sie tuliokuwa fungu lake Yesu Kristu, tukakombolewa kwa damu yake. Tusimamie katika masumbuko yetu kwa enzi na shime yako.

Ee Mlinzi amini wa jamaa takatifu, uwakinge watoto wateule wa Yesu Kristu.

Ee Baba uliyetupenda mno tuepushe na kilema chochote cha madanganyo na upotevu. Ee kinga yetu mwezaji, 

utusimamie huko juu mbinguni ulipo, tunaposhindana na wenye nguvu wakaao gizani.

 Kama vile siku za kale ukamwopoa Mtoto Yesu katika hatari ya kuuawa, na leo hivi likinge Kanisa Takatifu la Mungu katika mitego ya adui, na katika shida yote; 

mtunze daima kila mmoja wetu, tufwate mfano wako, ili tupate na msaada wako, kukaa na utakatifu maisha, kufa kifo chema, na kupata mbinguni makao ya raha milele.
Amina

songs.title: SALA YA MTAKATIFU YOSEFU
songs.lyrics:
SALA YA MTAKATIFU YOSEFU

Ee Yosefu mwenye heri, tunakimbilia kwako katika masumbuko yetu; na kisha omba shime ya Mchumba wako Mtakatifu,
tunaomba pia kwa matumaini usimamizi wako. 

Kwa ajili ya mapendo uliyompenda Bikira Mtakatifu mzazi wa Mungu, na kwa ajili ya kumtunza mtoto Yesu, twakuomba sana, utuangalie kwa wema siye tuliokuwa fungu lake Yesu Kristu, tukakombolewa kwa damu yake. Tusimamie katika masumbuko yetu kwa enzi na shime yako.

Ewe mlezi mwaminifu wa Familia Takatifu, uipe kibali familia yetu ya kiroho washiriki wote wa Jumuiya yetu ya Kikatoliki, utuunganishe kila wakati katika vifungo vya imani na upendo, na tubaki daima kwa moyo mmoja, akili na roho moja katika Moyo Mtakatifu wa Yesu na Moyo safi wa Bikira Maria.

Ee mlinzi amini wa jamaa takatifu, uwakinge watoto wateule wa Yesu Kristu. Ee Baba uliyetupenda mno tuepushe na kilema chochote cha madanganyo na upotevu. Ee kinga yetu mwezaji, utusimamie huko juu Mbinguni ulipo, tunaposhindana na wenye nguvu wakaao gizani,

 Kama vile siku za kale ukamwopoa mtoto Yesu katika hatari ya kuuawa, na leo hivi likinge Kanisa takatifu la Mungu katika mitego ya adui, na katika shida yote; mtunze daima kila mmoja wetu, kwa mfano wako, ili tupate na msaada wako, kukaa na utakatifu wa maisha, kufa kifo chema, na kupata Mbinguni makao ya raha milele. 
Amina.

songs.title: SALA YA SINODI
songs.lyrics:
SALA
KWA AJILI YA SINODI


Ewe Roho Mtakatifu, tunasimama mbele yako tunapojumuika pamoja katika jina lako.
Tukiongozwa nawe peke yako, tunakukaribisha mioyoni mwetu;
Tufundishe njia tunayopaswa kwenda na jinsi tunavyopaswa kuifuata.
Sisi ni dhaifu na wenye dhambi; usituache kwamwe tulete machafuko.


Usiruhusu kamwe ujinga utuongoze katika njia mbaya au ushawishi matendo yetu.
Tunakuomba utuunganishe ndani yako ili tupate kusafiri pamoja tukiuendea uzima wa milele na tusaidie tusipotee kutoka katika njia ya ukweli na haki.



Tunakuomba haya yote wewe ambaye unafanya kazi kila mahali na kila wakati, katika umoja wa Baba na Mwana, milele na milele.
Amina.

songs.title: SALA YA UKARIMU KWA MUNGU
songs.lyrics:
SALA YA UKARIMU KWA MUNGU

Ee Mungu, miguu yangu imesimama madhabahuni mwako nikiwa na shukrani kuu moyoni mwangu kwa ulinzi wako na mema ambayo umetenda maishani mwangu. Wewe ndiye tegemeo langu katika kila jambo. 

Naomba unipe moyo wa bidii kuhudhuria ibada zote katika hekalu hili unapoishi na kutoa Baraka za kipekee. 

Nijalie moyo wa ukarimu ili niweze kutimiza wajibu wangu kwako na kwa kanisa lako. Naahidi kufanya yote kwa uaminifu. Kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu 
AMINA.

songs.title: SALA YA UTAKASO
songs.lyrics:
SALA YA UTAKASO

Mungu mwenyezi Baba wa Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo, Nayakabidhi mapito yangu yote kwako. Naweka moyo wangu na maisha yangu mikononi mwako. Naahidi moyo wa kutii katika utumishi wangu kwako. Naomba uyatakase mambo yote katika maisha yangu yaani familia yangu,



 watoto wangu, kazi zangu, biashara yangu, shamba langu, wanyama wangu na kila kitu ulichonijalia. Nivunjie minyororo yote ya laana katika maisha yangu. Nifungulie mifereji ya Baraka zitiririke kutoka kwako na unijalie urejesho katika maisha yangu sasa na milele 
AMINA.

songs.title: Sasa Wakati Umefika
songs.lyrics:
SASA WAKATI UMEFIKA


Chorus
Sasa wakati umefika wakushika nilicho nacho mimi Kwa wema niende kwa Mungu nitoe zawadi. Sasa wakati umefika kwenda mbele ya Mungu wangu mimi Aone nilivyoandaa zawadi ya leo.


Nitamwambia Bwana pokea hiki kidogo nilicho nacho
Kwani Mungu wewe wanijua mimi siwezi hata kueleza
Nakusihi sana Baba unipokee
Nigawie na baraka niwe salama.


Verse 1
Mema yote niliyokuwa nayo yametoka kwa Mungu, 
hivyo nami ni kosa kusahau kumshukuru Kwani kuwepo hapa leo hii ni kazi ya nani
Kamwe mimi sitapata uwezo pasipo Mungu.


Verse 2
Mema aliyotenda Mungu nijibu lini na vipi?
Mbona hofu yazidi kuwa ndani ya moyo wangu. Mbele ya Bwana Mungu wangu kufanya siri ni bure,Yeye ndiye mpanga mambo yote ya wanadamu.


Verse 3
Pumzi inayonipa uhai inatoka kwa nani?
Bila Mungu hakika mwanadamu siwezi kitu. Nimepata nafasi leo ya kwenda kutoa zawadi
Heri niende ya kesho siyo yangu ajua Baba.


Verse 4
Ewe muumba wa vyote duniani na vyote vya mbinguni
Mimi leo nakuja kwako Baba, nihurumie. Baba ndiwe unayetawala kulala na kuamka kwangu
Juu yangu utake nini Baba kisifanyike.

songs.title: SECOND SUNDY OF ORDINRYTIME
songs.lyrics:
FIRST READING  
    1 Samuel 3:3b-10, 19
“Speak, Lord, for your servant hears.”

In those days: Samuel was lying down within the temple of the LORD, where the ark of God was. Then the LORD called, “Samuel! Samuel!” And he said,

 “Here I am!” And ran to Eli, and said, “Here I am, for you called me.” But he said, “I did not call; lie down again.” So he went and lay down. And the LORD called again, 

“Samuel!” And Samuel arose and went to Eli, and said, “Here I am, for you called me.” But he said, “I did not call, my son; lie down again.” Now Samuel did not yet know yet the LORD, 

and the word of the LORD had not yet been revealed to him. And the LORD called Samuel again the third time. And he arose and went to Eli, and said, “Here I am, For you called me.” 

Then Eli perceived that the LORD was calling the boy. Therefore Eli said to Samuel, “Go, lie down; and if he calls you, you shall say, ‘Speak, 

LORD, for your servant hears,”’ So Samuel went and lay down in his place. And the LORD came and stood forth, calling as at other times,

 “Samuel! Samuel!” And Samuel said, “Speak, for your servant hears.” And Samuel grew, and the LORD was with him and let none of his words fall to the ground.
The word of the Lord.

RESPONSORIAL PSALM  
PSALM  40: 2 and 4ab, 7-8a, 8b-9, 10 (R see. 8a,9a) 

R. 
See, I have come, LORD to do your will.


I waited, I waited for the LORD, And he stooped down to me;He heard my cry. He put a new song into my mouth, 
Praise of our God. R.


You delight not in sacrifice and offerings, but in an open ear.
You do not ask for holocaust and victim. Then I said, “See, I have come.” R


In the scroll of the book it stands written of me:
“I delight to do your will, O my God;
Your instruction lies deep within me.” R


Your justice I have proclaimed
In the great assembly.
My lips I have not sealed;
You know it, O LORD. R

SECOND READING  
 1 Corinthians 6:13c-15a, 17 -20
 “Your bodies are members of Christ.”

Brethren: The body is not meant for immorality, but for the Lord, and the Lord for the body. And God raised the Lord and he will also raise us up by his power. 

Do you not know that your bodies are members of Christ? But he who is united to the Lord becomes one spirit with him. 

Shun immorality. Every other sin which a man commits is outside the body; but the immoral man sins against his own body.

 Do you not know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit within you, which you have from God? 

You are not your own; you were bought with a price. So glorify God in your body.
The Word of the Lord.


GOSPEL           
   John 1: 35-42
They saw where he was staying; and they stayed with him.

At that time: John was standing with two of his disciples; and he looked at Jesus as he walked, and said, “Behold, the Lamb of God!” The two disciples heard him say this, 

and they followed Jesus. Jesus turned, and saw them following, and said to them, “What do you seek?” And they said to him, “Rabbi” (Which means Teacher), 

“where are you staying?” He said to them, “Come and see.” They came and saw where he was staying; and they stayed with him that day, 

for it was about the tenth hour. One of the two who heard John speak, and followed him, was Andrew, Simon Peter’s brother. 

He first found his brother Simon, and said to him, “We have found the Messiah” (Which means Christ). 

He brought him to Jesus. Jesus looked at him, and said, “So you are Simon the son of John? You shall be called Cephas” (Which means Peter). 
The Gospel of the Lord

GOSPEL ACCLAMATION 
See John 1:41,17b
Alleluia.
We have found the Messiah, who is Christ; 
grace and truth come through him.
 Alleluia.

SALA KABLA YA KOMUNIO


Ee Yesu, mkate wa mbingu, ninakututamani.
Uje kwangu uliye uzima na heri yangu.


Uje, chakula cha roho yangu, unitie imara.
Uje, Mwanakondoo wa Mungu, uondoe dhambi zangu.

Uje, ee Yesu, uungane nami, Amina.


SALA BAADA YA KOMUNIO


SALA YA MTAKATIFU INYASIO


Roho ya Kristu initakase.
Mwili wa Kristu uniokoe.


Damu ya Kristu inichangamshe.
Maji ya ubavu wa Kristu yanioshe.


Mateso ya Kristu nguvu yanizidishie.
Ee Yesu mwema, unisikilize.


Katika madonda yako unifiche.
Usikubali nitengane nawe.


Na adui mwovu unikinge
Saa kufa kwangu unite.


Uniamuru kwako nije.
Na watakatifu wako nikutukuze.


Milele na milele.  Amina.


KUIOMBEA PAROKIA YETU.


K.Ee Bwana Yesu Kristu, ndiwe kichwa cha kanisa lako hapa kwetu. Kwa matumaini tunakuomba kwa ajili ya waamini wote wa parokia yetu.
 


Uwalinde wote walio nyumbani na ugenini.
W. Usikilize maombi yetu (baada ya kila aya)


K. Uwaongoze wenye furaha na wenye huzuni
Uwasaidie wenye afya na wagonjwa
Uwavute watu wema na wenye bidii.


Uwaimarishe wote walio dhaifu.
Uwasimamishe walioanguka.


Uwahimize wavivu na wazembe.
uwaonye walio katika hatari ya kupotea.


Uwafariji wazima na wafu.


Atukuzwe Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.
Kama mwanzo na sasa na siku zote na milele milele Amina x 3


Tunaomba hayo kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu.  
Amina.


SALA YA UKARIMU KWA MUNGU

Ee Mungu, miguu yangu imesimama madhabahuni mwako nikiwa na shukrani kuu moyoni mwangu kwa ulinzi wako na mema ambayo umetenda maishani mwangu. Wewe ndiye tegemeo langu katika kila jambo. 

Naomba unipe moyo wa bidii kuhudhuria ibada zote katika hekalu hili unapoishi na kutoa Baraka za kipekee. 

Nijalie moyo wa ukarimu ili niweze kutimiza wajibu wangu kwako na kwa kanisa lako. Naahidi kufanya yote kwa uaminifu. Kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu 
AMINA.

SALA KWA AJILI YA MWAKA WA KATEKESI

Ee Mungu, ni mapenzi yako kuwa watu wote wapate kuujua ukweli na waokoke. Tunaomba uijaze mioyo yetu na moto wa upendo wako, tupate siku zote kujifunza na kuyaelewa mafundisho ya kweli na matakatifu ya mwanao Yesu Kristu, 

na ya Kanisa lako Takatifu, na kupata kuyaishi na kuyatekeleza maishani mwetu, hadi tuupate uzima wa milele kwako Mbinguni.

Tunakuomba uzidi kumbariki kila mmoja wetu kwa mapaji ya Roho wako Mtakatifu, tunapojibidiisha kuishi kikamilifu imani yetu kwa Kristu. 

Wajalie wote ambao bado hawajaisikia Injili, neema ya kukujua, kukupenda na kukutumikia, katika kweli na roho siku zote za maisha yao.
Tunaomba hayo kwa njia ya Kristu Bwana wetu.




NICENE CREED

I believe in one God,
the Father almighty,
maker of heaven and earth,
of all things visible and invisible.

I believe in one Lord Jesus Christ,
the Only Begotten Son of God,
born of the Father before all ages.

God from God, Light from Light,
true God from true God,
begotten, not made, consubstantial with the Father;
through him all things were made.

For us men and for our salvation
he came down from heaven,
and by the holy spirit was incarnate of the Virgin Mary,
and became man.

For our sake he was crucified under Pontius Pilate,
he suffered death and was buried,
and rose again on the third day
in accordance with the Scriptures.

He ascended into heaven
and is seated at the right hand of the Father.
He will come again in glory
to judge the living and the dead
and his kingdom will have no end.

I believe in the Holy Spirit, the Lord, the giver of Life,
who proceeds from the Father and the Son,
who with the Father and the Son is adored and glorified,
who has spoken through the Prophets.

I believe in one, holy, catholic and apostolic Church.
I confess one Baptism for the forgiveness of sins
and I look forward to the resurrection of the dead
and the life of the world to come.
 Amen

songs.title: sifa tunakusifu [wewe] mama
songs.lyrics:
sifa tunakusifu [wewe] mama bikira mtakatifu cecilia 
somo wetu, mama kwa sala zako [sote] tupatanishwa na

songs.title: SIMAMENI WATU WOTE
songs.lyrics:
simameni watu wote leo katika nyumba ya bwana furahini 
mbele zake bwana imbeni nyimbo za shangwe(shangiilieni)


vigelegele (pigeni) makofi hekaluni mwake meimbieni wimbo
mpya (watu wote)X2 wimbo mpya.

1.Akina mama wote (hoye) akina baba wote hoye njooni wote
mbele za shangwe , njooni wote mbele za bwana, njooni leo
mbarikiwe.

2.Enyi vijana wote hoye enyi wazee wote hoye njooni wote mbele
za bwana mkiimba nyimbo za shangwe , njooni wote mbele za bwana 
njooni leo mbarikiwe 

3. Watoto wetu wote njooni njooni mbele zake njooni mwimbieni
wimbo mpya, chezeni mbele za bwana, mwimbieni wimbo mpya , chezani 
mbele za bwana

4. Siku ya furaha leo ni siku yenye heri leo tunashukuru 
muumba wetu tumsifu mwenyezi mungu tucheze ngoma na vinanda 
tumsifu mwenyezi, mungu.

songs.title: Sisi wana dunia
songs.lyrics:
Sisi wana dunia tukumbuke maneno,
aliyosema Bikira Maria
Alipowatokea watoto wa Fatima,
Lucia Francis na Jacinta
Alisema tusali, tusali rosari, tupate amani

Na tuwaombee wale wakosefu wasio na mwombezi
Na wasiomwamini Yesu Mwokozi wamuamini ili waokoke

1.Mama yetu anahuzunishwa sana,
na matendo yetu maovu
Anajua adhabu yetu ijayo,
hivyo anaona huruma sana

2.Atusihi tuache dhambi kwa dhati,
tuache kumkosea Yesu
Tuyatubu makosa yetu yote,
ili Bwana atupatie amani

3.Tusitende maovu na dhambi,
atusihi mama wa Yesu,
Tusimkasirishe tena Mungu,
asije tutupa motoni milele


4.Ibada ya moyo safi wa Maria,
tuizingatie daima,
Tupokee komunio takatifu,
kila Jumamosi ya kwanza ya mwezi

songs.title: SISTER
songs.lyrics:
GOSPEL
 Luke 10:1-9 
 
 

After this the Lord appointed seventy-two [a] others and sent them two by two ahead of him to every town and place where he was about to go.  He told them, “The harvest is plentiful, but the workers are few. 

Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field. Go! I am sending you out like lambs among wolves. 

Do not take a purse or bag or sandals; and do not greet anyone on the road.
The Gospel of the lord

SECOND READING
Romans 8:28-30 
 

And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.  

For those God foreknew he also predestined to be conformed to the image of his Son, that he might be the firstborn among many brothers and sisters.  

And those he predestined, he also called; those he called, he also justified; those he justified, he also glorified. 
The word of the Lord


FIRST READING
Jeremiah 1:4-10 

And we know that The word of the Lord came to me, saying: “Before I formed you in the womb I knew you,before you were born I set you apart; I appointed you as a prophet to the nations.”  

“Alas, Sovereign Lord,” I said, “I do not know how to speak: I am too young." But the Lord said to me, “Do not say, ‘I am too young.’ You must go to everyone I send you to and say whatever I command you.  

Do not be afraid of them, for I am with you and will rescue you,” declares the Lord. Then the Lord reached out his hand and touched my mouth and said to me, 

“I have put my words in your mouth. See, today I appoint you over nations and kingdoms to uproot and tear down, to destroy and overthrow, to build and to plant.” 
The word of the Lord

RESPONSORIAL PSALM
Psalm 116:12-13.14-15.16-17 (R. 12)




R
How can I repay the Lord for all his goodness to me?

How can I repay the LORD for all his goodness to me? The cup of salvation I will raise; I will call on the name of the LORD. R.


My vows to the LORD I will fulfil before all his people. How precious in the eyes of the LORD is the death of his faithful. R.


Your servant, LORD, your servant am I, the son of your handmaid; you have loosened my bonds. A thanksgiving sacrifice I make; I will call on the name of the LORD. R.


GOSPEL ACCLAMATION
See John 6:63c,68c
Alleluia
 Your words, Lord, are Spirit and life; you have the words eternal life. 
Alleluia.

1. Maisha yangu [yote] nakutolea [wewe] Eh Mungu wangu [Bwana] unipokee [Kwako]x2 


Bwana maisha yangu mimi nampa Bwana x2, 
Nilivyo- navyo vyote ni mali ya Bwana Maisha yangu yote nampa Bwana x2

2. Ujana wangu [mimi], ulionipa [wewe] x1, najitolea [kwako ] kukuhudumu [wewe] x2


3. Uzee wangu ulionipa najitolea kukuhudumu

4. Nimeamua [mimi] na nyumba yangu [yote] x1, kumtumikia [Mungu] milele (yote) x2

SALA KABLA YA KOMUNIO


Ee Yesu, mkate wa mbingu, ninakututamani.
Uje kwangu uliye uzima na heri yangu.


Uje, chakula cha roho yangu, unitie imara.
Uje, Mwanakondoo wa Mungu, uondoe dhambi zangu.


Uje, mganga wa roho, uponye udhaifu wangu.
Uje, ee Yesu, uungane nami, Amina.


SALA BAADA YA KOMUNIO


SALA YA MTAKATIFU INYASIO


Roho ya Kristu initakase.
Mwili wa Kristu uniokoe.


Damu ya Kristu inichangamshe.
Maji ya ubavu wa Kristu yanioshe.


Mateso ya Kristu nguvu yanizidishie.
Ee Yesu mwema, unisikilize.


Katika madonda yako unifiche.
Usikubali nitengane nawe.


Na adui mwovu unikinge
Saa kufa kwangu unite.


Uniamuru kwako nije.
Na watakatifu wako nikutukuze.


Milele na milele.  Amina.


KUIOMBEA PAROKIA YETU.


K.Ee Bwana Yesu Kristu, ndiwe kichwa cha kanisa lako hapa kwetu. Kwa matumaini tunakuomba kwa ajili ya waamini wote wa parokia yetu.
 


Uwalinde wote walio nyumbani na ugenini.
W. Usikilize maombi yetu (baada ya kila aya)


K. Uwaongoze wenye furaha na wenye huzuni
Uwasaidie wenye afya na wagonjwa
Uwavute watu wema na wenye bidii.


Uwaimarishe wote walio dhaifu.
Uwasimamishe walioanguka.


Uwahimize wavivu na wazembe.
uwaonye walio katika hatari ya kupotea.


Uwafariji wazima na wafu.


Atukuzwe Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.
Kama mwanzo na sasa na siku zote na milele milele Amina x 3


Tunaomba hayo kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu.  
Amina.


SALA YA UKARIMU KWA MUNGU

Ee Mungu, miguu yangu imesimama madhabahuni mwako nikiwa na shukrani kuu moyoni mwangu kwa ulinzi wako na mema ambayo umetenda maishani mwangu. Wewe ndiye tegemeo langu katika kila jambo. 

Naomba unipe moyo wa bidii kuhudhuria ibada zote katika hekalu hili unapoishi na kutoa Baraka za kipekee. 

Nijalie moyo wa ukarimu ili niweze kutimiza wajibu wangu kwako na kwa kanisa lako. Naahidi kufanya yote kwa uaminifu. Kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu 
AMINA.

SALA KWA AJILI YA MWAKA WA KATEKESI

Ee Mungu, ni mapenzi yako kuwa watu wote wapate kuujua ukweli na waokoke. Tunaomba uijaze mioyo yetu na moto wa upendo wako, tupate siku zote kujifunza na kuyaelewa mafundisho ya kweli na matakatifu ya mwanao Yesu Kristu, 

na ya Kanisa lako Takatifu, na kupata kuyaishi na kuyatekeleza maishani mwetu, hadi tuupate uzima wa milele kwako Mbinguni.

Tunakuomba uzidi kumbariki kila mmoja wetu kwa mapaji ya Roho wako Mtakatifu, tunapojibidiisha kuishi kikamilifu imani yetu kwa Kristu. 

Wajalie wote ambao bado hawajaisikia Injili, neema ya kukujua, kukupenda na kukutumikia, katika kweli na roho siku zote za maisha yao.
Tunaomba hayo kwa njia ya Kristu Bwana wetu.




KANUNI YA IMANI

Nasadiki kwa Mungu mmoja,
Baba Mwenyezi,
Mwumba wa mbingu na dunia
na vitu vyote vinavyoonekana na visivyoonekana.

Nasadiki kwa Bwana mmoja Yesu Kristo,
Mwana pekee wa Mungu,
aliyezaliwa kwa Baba tangu milele yote.

Mungu aliyetoka kwa Mungu, Mwanga kwa mwanga,
Mungu kweli kwa Mungu kweli,
aliyezaliwa bila kuumbwa, mwenye umungu mmoja na Baba,
ambaye vitu vyote vimeumbwa naye.

Alishuka kutoka Mbinguni, kwa ajili yetu sisi wanadamu,
na kwa ajili ya wokovu wetu.
Akapata mwili kwa uwezo wa Roho Mtakatifu
kwake yeye Bikira Maria, akawa mwanadamu.

Akasulubiwa kwa ajili yetu sisi, kwa mamlaka ya Ponsyo Pilato; akateswa, akafa na akazikwa,
siku ya tatu akafufuka, kadiri ya Maandiko,
akapaa mbinguni, ameketi kuume kwa Baba.

Atakuja tena kwa utukufu, kuwahukumu wazima na wafu,
na ufalme wake hautakuwa na mwisho.
Nasadiki kwa Roho Mtakatifu, Bwana na mleta uzima,
atokaye kwa Baba na Mwana.

Anayeabudiwa na kutukuzwa, pamoja na Baba na Mwana,
aliyenena kwa vinywa vya manabii.
Nasadiki kwa kanisa moja, takatifu, katoliki, la mitume.

Naungama ubatizo mmoja kwa maondoleo ya dhambi.
Nangojea ufufuko wa wafu,
na uzima wa milele ijayo. 
Amina.


Misa st Michael



Ewe Bwana utuhurumie
Ewe Bwana Ewe Bwana utuhurumie X2
Ewe Kristu utuhurumie,Ewe Kristu,Ewe Kristu utuhurumie X2




Utukufu kwa Mungu Mbinguni na amani.iwe ulimwenguni kwa watu walio na Mapenzi 
Mema X2

1.(a) Twakusifu,Tunakuheshimu, Twakuabudu tunakutuza, Shukrani kwa tukufu wake. 
(b) Bwana Mungu mfalme wa Mbinguni Mungu Baba, Baba Mwenyezi Yesu Mwana wa pekee.

 (b) Pamoja na Roho Mtakatifu ni katika Matukio utukufu wako Mungu Baba Amina�

NENO LA MUNGU WETU


neno la mungu wetu linakuja nenoX2
lipokee neno ni uzima neno lipokee neno ni 
tulizo la roho X2


1. sote twaitwa kwake mungu wetu mwenye heri yeye mwalimu wetu
atatufundisha yote X2

2. jabali langu mimi tegemoe langu bwana yeye tulizo langu nimwogope nani mimi X2

3.neno linifundishe nizishike amri zako hili nikupendeze we mungu muumba wangu X2


4.neno liniongeze nimuepuke shetani nimulikie watu wawe watumishi wako X2

NICENE CREED

I believe in one God,
the Father almighty,
maker of heaven and earth,
of all things visible and invisible.

I believe in one Lord Jesus Christ,
the Only Begotten Son of God,
born of the Father before all ages.

God from God, Light from Light,
true God from true God,
begotten, not made, consubstantial with the Father;
through him all things were made.

For us men and for our salvation
he came down from heaven,
and by the holy spirit was incarnate of the Virgin Mary,
and became man.

For our sake he was crucified under Pontius Pilate,
he suffered death and was buried,
and rose again on the third day
in accordance with the Scriptures.

He ascended into heaven
and is seated at the right hand of the Father.
He will come again in glory
to judge the living and the dead
and his kingdom will have no end.

I believe in the Holy Spirit, the Lord, the giver of Life,
who proceeds from the Father and the Son,
who with the Father and the Son is adored and glorified,
who has spoken through the Prophets.

I believe in one, holy, catholic and apostolic Church.
I confess one Baptism for the forgiveness of sins
and I look forward to the resurrection of the dead
and the life of the world to come.
 Amen

songs.title: T THE MASS DURING THE DAY25
songs.lyrics:
FIRST READING 
Isaiah 52:7-10
All the ends of the earth shall see the salvation of  Our God

How beautiful upon the mountains are the feet of him who brings good tidings, who publishes peace, who brings good tidings of good, who publishes salvation, who says to Zion, "Your God reigns."


Listen, your watchmen lift up their voice, together they sing for joy; for eye to eye they see the return of the LORD to Zion.
Break forth together into singing, you waste places of Jerusalem; for the LORD has comforted his people, he has redeemed Jerusalem.



The LORD has bared his holy arm before the eyes of all the nations; and all the ends of the earth shall see the salvation of our God.
The word of the Lord.




RESPONSORIAL PSALM
	Psalm 98:1.2-3ab-4,5-6(R.3cd)

R. 
All the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God


O sing a new song to the LORD, for he has worked wonders. His right hand and his holy arm have brought salvation. R.

The LORD has made known his salvation, has shown his deliverance to the nations. He has remembered his merciful love and his truth for the house of Israel. R

All the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God.
Shout to the LORD, all the earth; break forth into joyous song, and sing out your praise, R.




Sing psalms to the LORD with the harp, with the harp and the sound of song.
With trumpets and the sound of the horn, raise a shout before the King, the LORD. R.





SECOND READING
	Hebrews 1:1-6	
God has spoken to us by a Son.

In many and various ways God spoke of old to our fathers by the prophets; but in these last days he has spoken to us by a Son, whom he appointed the heir of all things, through whom also he created the ages.

He reflects the glory of God and bears the very stamp of his nature, upholding the universe by his word of power.
When he had made purification for sins, he sat down at the right hand of the Majesty on high, having become as much superior to angels as the name he has obtained is more excellent than theirs.




For to what angel did God ever say,
"You are my Son, today I have begotten you"? Or again, "1 will be to him a father, and he shall be to me a son'? he brings the first-born into the world, he says,let all God angels worship him”
The word of the Lord




GOSPEL ACCLAMATION
ALLELUIA
	 A hallowed day has shone upon us: come, O nations, and adore the Lord; for today a great light has come down to earth. 
Alleluia.

GOSPEL
	John 1:1-18
The Word became flesh and dwelt among us

In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God. He was in the beginning with God; all things were made through him, and without him was not anything made that was made.
In him was life, and the life was the light of men.

The light shines in the darkness, and the darkness has not overcome it
There was a man sent from God, whose name was John. He came for testimony, to bear witness to the light, that all might believe through him.
He was not the light, but came to bear witness to the light.

The true light that enlightens every man was coming into the world. He was in the world, and the world was made through him, yet the world knew him not.
He came to his own home, and his own people received him not. But to all who received him, who believed in his name, he gave power to become children of God;

 who were born, not of blood nor of the will of the flesh nor of the will of man, but of God.
And the Word became flesh and dwelt among us, full of grace and truth; we have beheld his glory,as of the only-begotten Son from the Father(John bore witness to him, and cried, 



"This was he of whom I said, 'He who comes after me ranks before me, for he was before me.
And from his fullness have we all received, grace upon grace. 




For the law was given through Moses; grace and truth came through Jesus Christ. No one has ever seen God; the only-begotten Son, who is in the bosom of the Father, he has made him known.
The Gospel of the Lord.

Tazama Bwana tunakuja kwako (leo) Twaleta zawadi zetu mbele yako Tunakuomba Mungu Baba pokea.

songs.title: THE JUBILEE PRAYER 2025
songs.lyrics:
THE JUBILEE PRAYER

Father in Heaven, may the faith you have given us in your Son, Jesus Christ, our brother, and the flame of charity enkindled in our hearts by the Holy Spirit, 

reawaken in us the blessed hope for the coming of your Kingdom. May your grace transform us into tireless cultivators of the seeds of the Gospel. 

May those seeds transform from within both humanity and the whole cosmos in the sure expectation of a new heaven and a new earth, when, with the powers of evil vanquished, 

your glory will shine eternally. May the grace of the Jubilee reawaken in us, Pilgrims of Hope, a yearning for the treasures of heaven. 

May that same grace spread the joy and peace of our Redeemer throughout the earth. To you our God, eternally blessed, be glory and praise for ever.
O Lord, we pray

songs.title: THE SOLEMNITY OF OUR LORD
songs.lyrics:
FIRST READING
2 Samuel 5:1-3
	They anointed David king over Israel
	

HebronIn those days: All the tribes of Israel came to David at Hebron, and said, "Behold, we are your bone and flesh, In times past, when Saul was king over us, it was you that led out and brought in Israel; and the LORD said to you,

Hebron

'You shall be shepherd of my people Israel, and you shall be prince over Israel. "'
so all the elders of Israel came to the king at Hebron; and King David made a covenant with them at Hebron before the LORD, and they anointed David king over Israel.
The word of the Lord.



RESPONSORIAL PSALM
	Psalm 122:1-2-4-5(R1)	


R. 
Let us go rejoicing to the house of the Lord.


I rejoiced when they said to me,
"Let us go to the house of the LORD."
And now our feet are standing within your gates, O Jerusalem R,



It is there that the tribes go up, the tribes of the LORD.
For Israel's witness it is to praise the name of the LORD.
There were set the thrones for judgment,
Ones of the house of David. R,



SECOND READING
Colossians 1:12-20
He has transferred us to the kingdom of his beloved Son,

Brethren:
We give thanks to the Father, who has qualified us to share in the inheritance of the saints in light. He has delivered us from the dominion of darkness and transferred us to the kingdom of his beloved Son, in whom we have redemption, the forgiveness of sins. 

He is the image of the invisible God, the first-born of all creation; for in him all things were created, in heaven and on earth, visible and invisible, whether thrones or dominions or principalities or authorities  all things were created through him and for him.

He is before all things, and in him all things hold together. He is the head of the body, the Church; he is the beginning, the first-born from the dead, that in everything he might be pre-eminent.





For in him all the fullness of God was pleased to dwell, and through him to reconcile to himself all things, whether on earth or in heaven, making peace by the blood of his cross.
The word of the Lord.





GOSPEL ACCLAMATION
Mark 11:9b,10a 
Alleluia.
 Blessed is he who comes in the name of the Lord!
Blessed is the kingdom of our father David that is coming!
Alleluia.

GOSPEL
Luke 23:35-43
Lord, remember me when you come in your kingly power,

At that time:
The rulers scoffed at Jesus, saying, "He saved others; let him save himself, if the is the Christ of God, his Chosen One!"
The soldiers also mocked him, 

coming up and offering him vinegar, and saying, "If you are the King of the Jews, save yourself?'
There was also an inscription over him,
"This is the King of the Jews."


One of the criminals who were hanged railed at him, saying,
"Are you not the Christ? Save yourself and us!"
But the other rebuked him, saying, "Do you not fear God, since you are under the same sentence of condemnation? 



And we indeed justly; for we are receiving the due reward of our deeds; but this man has done nothing wrong."
And he said,
"Jesus, remember me when you come in your kingly power."




And he said to him,
"Truly, I say to you, today you will be with me in Paradise." 
The Gospel of the Lord.

songs.title: TWENDENI KWA KARAMU
songs.lyrics:
TWENDENI KWA KARAMU


1.Twendeni kwa karamu ya Bwana tumeitwa–twendeni,twende kumpokea.
Ni mwaliko wa Bwana–tukale mkate wa uzima


2.Tujitakase  mbele ya kwenda  kwa karamu hii-twendeni,twende kumpokea.
Twende  watakatifu-tukale mkate wa uzima


3.Karibu  kwangu,Yesu  ukae kwangu daima-twendeni,twende kumpokea.
Nifunze njia yako-tukale mkate wa uzima


4.Na Kwa uwezo  wako  imani yangu  nakiri-twendeni,twende kumpokea.-
Ndiwe  Mungu Mwokozi tukale mkate wa uzima-


5.Usituache basi,pamoja  nasi ukae-twendeni,twende kumpokea.
Kwa kuwa kumekuchwa-tukale mkate wa uzima


6.Na tufurahi  mwisho pamwe na Baba milele–twendeni,twende kumpokea.
Kwa umoja na Roho-tukale mkate wa uzima

songs.title: Twendeni mezani mwa bwana
songs.lyrics:
Twendeni mezani mwa bwana

Twendeni mezani mwa bwana wapendwaX2tukale mwili wa bwana,tukanyue damu ya bwana,ili tupate uzima wa milele(wote)twndeni mezani mwa Bwana

1.Kinywaji chake Bwana kitayari,twendeni watu wote tukanywe


2 Tutashibishwa kiu itaisha,twendeni wote basi tushiriki



3 Ashirikiye karamu ya nbwana ataishi milele na milele

songs.title: Twendeni mezani tukale chakula
songs.lyrics:
Twendeni mezani tukale chakula tumeandaliwa chakula cha mbingu.X2

1.Mwili wake Bwana chakula cha mbinguni Tumeandaliwa chakula cha mbingu

2.Damu yake Bwana kinywaji cha  mbingu,tumeandaliwa kinywaji cha mbingu

3.Kila aulaye apate uzima tumeandaliwa chakula cha mbingu


4.Tuulapo mwili Tapatalk uzima tumeandaliwa chakula cha mbingu

songs.title: TWENDENI TUKAMTOLEE
songs.lyrics:
TWENDENI TUKAMTOLEE


Twendeni tukamtolee mungu sadaka madhabahuni pake
kama desturi yetu twendeni tukamtolee vyote ni yeye
ametujalia tumtolee kama shukrani kama desturi yetu 
twendeni tukamtolee

1. Kile alichokujalia na moyo wako ukaridhia ukampe 
Bwana utakurudishia baraka


2. Rudi kwanza ukapatane na yule muliokoseana ndipo 
ukatoe na Bwana Mungu akubariki


3. Toa kwa moyo wa upendo na tena kwa moyo wa shukrani 
naye Bwana Mungu ayabariki maisha yako

songs.title: Twimbe kwa shangwe (latetest)
songs.lyrics:
Twimbe kwa shangwe na furaha *2
Bwana ametufanyia makuu*2

1.Tuingie kwake Mungu wetu,
Tuingie kwake kwa shukrani,
Bwana ametufanyia makuu


2.Yeye ndiye Mungu wa miungu,
Yeye ndiye Bwana wa mabwana,
Bwana ametufanyia makuu



3.Bwana ni mfalme wa wafalme,
Yeye ndiye Baba wa viumbe,
Bwana ametufanyia makuu

4.Ametenda mambo ya ajabu,
Aliye gizani hatajua,
Bwana ametufanyia makuu

5.Tuingie kwake Muumba wetu
Tuingie kwake kwa shukrani
Bwana ametufanyia makuu




6.Sifa na heshima kwake Mungu
Mwenye utukufu wa ajabu
Bwana ametufanyia makuu

songs.title: UJE ROHO MTAKATIFU TUANGAZE  (SEKWENSIA)2022
songs.lyrics:
UJE ROHO MTAKATIFU TUANGAZE(SEKWENSEA)

1.uje Roho Mtakatifu,tuangaze toka mbingu Roho zetu kwa mwangao

2.Uje Baba wa maskini,uje mtoa wa vipaji uje mwanga wa mioyo

3.Ee Mfariji mwema sana,ee Rafiki mwanana Ewe raha mustarehe

4.Kwenye kazi u pumziko,kwenye joto,burudiko u mfutaji wa machozi

5.Ewe mwanga wenye heri,uwajaze waamini Neema yako mioyoni

6.Bila nguvu yakow ewe,mwanadamu hana kitu kwake yote yana kosa



7.Osha machafuko yetu,panyeshee pakavu petu Na kuponya majeraha

8.Ulegeze ukaidi,washa moto wa uadili Nyoosha upotevu wote



9.wape waumini wako ,wenye tumaini kwako paji zako zote saba 


10.Wape tuzo ya fadhila wape mwisho bila hila Wape heri milele

songs.title: Unihurumie mimi  MANENO YA WIMBO
songs.lyrics:
Maneno ya wimbo
.

Unihurumie mimi Bwana, nimetenda dhambi mimi Bwana, ninakusihi, ee Mungu wangu, unisamehe, makosa yangu, ( niliyokutendea wewe Mungu wangu na jirani zangu ) x 2

1.Dhambi zimenitenga nawe, Bwana unihurumie, mimi ni mkosefu.

2.	Nauogopa uso wako, kwani nimekosa Baba, unihurumie.

3.	Ewe Baba mwenye huruma, unihurumie mimi, nimetenda dhambi.


4.	Uisafishe roho yangu, uniimarishe Bwana, nisitende dhambi

songs.title: UNIONDOLEE DHAMBI
songs.lyrics:
UNIONDOLEE DHAMBI


Uniondolee dhambi nitakase,
Unioshe niwe mweupe pe x2


1.Nakiri makosa yangu, naziona dhambi zangu Unioshe niwe mweupe


2.Kweli mimi mkosefu, tangu kuzaliwa kwangu mwenye dhambi tangu tumboni mwa mamangu


3.Hivyo unafanya vyema, we unaponihukumu Una haki unaponiadhibu


4.Wewe wataka unyofu, ule unyofu wa ndani Nifundishe hekima moyoni


5.Niumbie moyo safi, na uweke ndani yangu  Roho mpya iliyo dhabiti

songs.title: Usiku wa manane kazaliwa
songs.lyrics:
SHANGWE ZA NOELI 

1. Usiku wa manane kazaliwa  mwokozi Yesu aleluya aleluya ndiye mwana wa maria mkombozi wa ulimwengu aleluya aleluya. 


Noeli noeli amezaliwa Shangwe za noeli amezaliwa aleluya tushangilie X2.


2. Mungu kajifanya mwili akazaliwa kati yetu aleluya aleluya Nuru imetung'aria tuimbe na tushangilie aleluya aleluya. 


3. Amezaliwa Emanueli Mungu pamoja nasi aleluya aleluya Shangwe furaha duniani kazaliwa mwokozi wetu aleluya aleluya.

songs.title: Utambi mchafu
songs.lyrics:
MWANZI ULIOPONDEKA


1.Utambi mchafu wa moshi mzito Hata uzima kadhalika mwanzi Uliopondeka kamwe hata uvunja


Hatanitupa bwana yesu (milele yote) atanipigania 
Hataniacha bwana yesu (niangamie) atanipigania


2.Najua mtetesi wangu ni mwema Mwenye huruma mwingi wa rehema Asiye yahesabu maovu ya watu


3.Nakiri mimi mdhaifu kabisa Nimeanguka kulitii neno Lakini ni tamuangukia mwenyezi


4.Nanyi ndugu zangu kweenu Na tubu niliyofanya si kuwapendeza Nisamehe nichukulie ni pia


5.Sikati tamaa kwa kuwa najua Yesu Mwokozi amenisamehe Kwa kuwa hiyo ndio tabia ya yesu

songs.title: UTUKFU ST CECILA(MWASHUMA)
songs.lyrics:
UTUKUFU ST CECILA


(utukufu juu kwake Mungu Baba ) na amani iwe duniani kote , kwa watu wenye ma-penzi mema x2

1. Tunaku-sifu tunakuheshimu , tunakuabudu tunakutukuza

2. Tunakushukuru Mungu kwa ajili ya utukufu  
 wako Bwana Mungu

3. Ee bwana yesu mwana wa pekee , mwana kondoo wake Mungu Baba

4. Mwenye kuondoa dhambi za dunia, utuhurumie utusikilize



5.Mwenye kuuketi kuume kwake baba, peke yako mkuu peke yako kristu



6.Pamoja na roho, roho mtakatifu ndani yake baba una tu-ukuzwa

songs.title: UTUKUFU REHEMA
songs.lyrics:
Utukufu uwe kwa mungu [na amani duniani watu wenye mapenzi mema]X2


1.Tunakusifu tunakuheshimu,
tunakuabudu
tunakutukuza









2.Tunakushuru mfalme wa mbinguni mwana wa pekee mwana wake baba




3.unayeondoa dhambi za dunia utuhurumie utusikilize





4.Kuume kwa Baba we unakoketi,mtakatifu mkuu utuhurumie




5.Roho mtakatifu kwa umoja nawe tukufu  wa baba milele amina

songs.title: utukufu st joseph
songs.lyrics:
utukufu st joseph


utukufu kwa mbinguni na amani kwa watu wa mapenzi mema 




Tunakusifu tunakuheshimu tunakuabudu tunakutukuzaX2








1.twakushukuru mwenye utukufu mfalme wa mbinguni mungu naye baba yetu





2.Ee bwana yesu mwana wa pekee uliye mwana wa pekee mwana kondoo wa mungu







3.Mwenye kufuta dhambi za dunia utuhurumie na utusikilize







4.Unayeketi kuume kwa baba upokee yako mkuu ewe yesu kristu





5.Pamoja naye roho mtakatifu katika utukufu wa mungu baba

songs.title: UTUKUFU SUBUKIA MASS NEW LYRICS
songs.lyrics:
UTUKUFU SUBUKIA MASS NEW LYRICS

Utukufu kwa Mungu juu na amani duniani,
Kwa watu aliowaridhia, kwa watu aliowaridhia (x2)


1. Tunakusifu tunakuheshimu, twakuabudu tunakutukuza,
Twakushukuru kwa ajili ya utukufu wako mkuu.


2. Ee Bwana Mungu mfalme wa mbinguni Mungu Baba mwenyezi,
Ee Bwana Yesu Kristo mwana pekee, ee Bwana Mungu mwana kondoo wa Mungu, mwana wa Baba.


3. Mwenye kuondoa dhambi za ulimwengu tuhuru mie, utuhurumie,
Mwenye kuondoa dhambi za ulimwengu pokea ombi letu.

4. Mwenye kuketi kuume kwa Baba utuhurumie utuhurumie,
Kwa kuwa ndiwe uliye peke yako mtakatifu peke yako,
Bwana uliye juu kabisa, Yesu Kristo katika utukufu.


5. Pamoja na roho mtakatifu, katika utukufu,
Wa Mungu Baba Amina Amina Amina.




MISA SUBUKIA

 UTUHURUMIE
Bwana, Bwana, Bwana utuhurumie *2
Kristu utuhurumie, Kristu utuhurumie *2
Bwana, Bwana, Bwana utuhurumie *2


UTUKUFU  (SUBUKIA)

Utukufu juu kwa Mungu, na amani duniani,
kwao watu wenye mapenzi,
watu wenye mapenzi mema  *2

1.Tunakusifu tunakuheshimu, twakuabudu tunakutukuza
Twakushukuru kwa ajili yako, ya utukufu wako mkuu.

2.Ee Mungu baba ndiwe mfalme,
Mfalme wa Mbinguni baba mwenyezi.
Ee Yesu Kristu mwana wa pekee,
mwanakondoo mwana wa Baba.


3.Uondoaye dhambi za watu tuhurumie tusikilize,
Tuhurumie mwenye rehema maombi yetu uyapokee.


4.Uketiye kuume kwake, Mungu baba tuhurumie.
Kwa kuwa ndiwe pekee yako, Pekee yako Mtakatifu.


5.Pamoja naye roho Mtakatifu, katika utukufu wake
Anayeishi na kutawala, milele yote Amina.

songs.title: VIPAJI HIVI  NI  KAMA DHABIHU
songs.lyrics:
VIPAJI HIVI  NI  KAMA DHABIHU


Vipaji hivi ni,kama dhabihu yenye harufu nzuri sadaka inayo kubaliwa na kumpendeza Mungu X2
kwa furaha ,kwa
imani,kwa mapendo tutoe(na)tutoe kwa shukrani X2


1.	Tupeleke mazao ya mashamba tupeleke nayo mifugo
     Tupeleke vilivyo vinono kama sadaka ya Abeli


2. Nazo fedha ni mali ya bwana, tumepata kwa neema zake 
    Tupeleke kwa moyo was ala tupeleke shukrani zetu





3.Tupeleke nazo nafsi zetu, tuzitoe kama dhabihu
  Tumwombe mungu atubariki,tukatende impendezavyo

songs.title: Vipaji tumepewa,
songs.lyrics:
1.Vipaji tumepewa, mapato tumepata
Lakini binadamu tunashindwa kushukuru Wakati tunaomba, tunajinyenyekesha
Lakini tukipata mikono yetu birika


Mpeni kaisari, yaliyo yake
Mpeni Mungu (yale) yaliyo yake Mungu *2


2.Mifugo tunafuga, nafaka tunavuna

Itakayopendeza, kama ile ya Abeli

songs.title: WE NDUKAHUNIE GUOKO
songs.lyrics:
WE NDUKAHUNIE GUOKO


1.We  ndukahunie  guoko riria ugucokia ngatho; Ngai  we  ndakuheire o kingotore; Ni  manoti matheri ;ni mburi na ni ng'ombe; Ni Kahua, macani na indo ingi.


Ruta muhothi  waku Ciana cione ndathimi,Aciari na arata  marathimwo( Biacara yaku) nayo  irathimwo Ihote  guthererema. Tanahira Ngai uria wakuheire.(Ndukahunie   guoko)


2.Ti kumuhe  ukumuhe ni guoko  ugucokia' Na niundu wa indo ciothe iria akuhete.Wakariha na ciene ,ko ni ciaku ungika atia? Kenia Ngai na ngatho  yaku.



 3.Ugoti wa Gaithari Mwathani ekuga urute  n'omenye  urute  ugoti,ii wa Mwathani. Kanitha ni muhothi wee nawe  ukirungii  ha?, Ta kirute kanitha yakike



4.Iga muthithu waku bengi-'ni ya Mwathani Niguo Kanitha  yake  igithereme, Niaribaragirira kinya  ugakinya  gwake. Uguo-ta-iga bengi-ni yake.

songs.title: WE THREE KINGS
songs.lyrics:
We three kings of orient are
Bearing gifts we traverse afar
Field and fountain
Moor and mountain
Following yonder star



O star of wonder, star of night
Star with royal beauty bright
Westward leading, still proceeding
Guide us to thy perfect light


Born a King on Bethlehem's plain
Gold I bring to crown Him again
King for ever, ceasing never
Over us all to reign


Frankincense to offer have I
Incense owns a Deity nigh
Prayer and praising, all men raising
Worship Him, God most high




Glorious now behold Him arise
King and God and Sacrifice!
Al-le-lu-ia, al-le-lu-ia
Heaven to earth replies

songs.title: WIMUKUMIE WEE MWATHANI
songs.lyrics:
WIMUKUMIE WEE MWATHANI


Wimukumie wee Mwathani ,Ngai wa thin na waiguru, niundu wotana waku? nitwamukirite matege  maya  twarehe X2





1.  Mugate hamwe na njohi-nitwagutegera Mwathani Maciaro ma migunda itu - twagikuria umamukire




2.Magetha ohamwe na mbecea- ni thithino ya moko maitu 

3.Mahiu ona migunda itu -ona mawira maitu mothe

4 Ikeno na mathina maitu- Mahoya matarania maitu 





5. Bururi atongoria aitu- Micii itu aturi akuo

songs.title: Yatosha sasa
songs.lyrics:
Yatosha sasa mahangaiko haya, yatosha, mapigo ni mengi mno. Yatosha sasa mateso makali haya, yatosha kabisa, yatosha mno. 

1. Ee Mungu tazama chozi langu, sikiliza kilio changu. Narudi kwako mara nyingine, kulilia huruma yako. 

2. Natamani nami nipumzike, Ee Mungu chukua hatua. Kwa nini unanyamaza kimya, naita mpaka nazimia? 

3. Siwezi, siwezi ee Mungu; Mizigo yanielemea. 

4. Upendo wako Mungu, nitautumainia bila kuchoka. 

5. Huruma yako Mungu, ni huruma ya milele. Huruma yako Mungu, nitakufa nikiitumainia.

songs.title: Yesu kristu ni mfalme
songs.lyrics:
Yesu kristu ni mfalme ni mfalme wa wafalme ni bwana wa mabwana utawala wake si wa dunia hii(bali) utawala wake ni wa mbinguni




1.Utawala wake yesu unjgekuwa ni wa dunia hii (kweli) hakika angekua jeshi lake la kumlinda

2.Utawala wake yesu ungekuwa ni wa dunia hii (kweli) hakika ingekuwa na serikali ya kuiongoza 
 



3.Utawala  wake yesu unjgekuwa ni wa dunia hii (kweli)kamwe asingekufa kwa ajili yetu sisi wanadamu

yesu kristu ni mfalme

Hakika angekuwa na jeshi lake la kumlinda.


2. Utawala wake Yesu ungekuwa ni dunia hii
(kweli) Hakika angekuwa na serikali ya kuiongoza.

3. Utawala wake Yesu ungekuwa ni wa dunia hii (kweli)
Kamwe asingekufa kwa ajili yetu sisi wanadamu.

songs.title: YESU NI UZIMA WANGU WAITHAKA
songs.lyrics:
YESU NI UZIMA WANGU

(Ee Yesu wewe ni uzima wangu, kiongozi bora wa maisha yangu, nilapo mwili wako na kunywa damu yako, naupata uzima wa milele) x2

1.	Nishibishe kwa mwili wako yesu, nipate wokovu wa maisha yangu 

2.	Uninyweshe kwa  damu yako ee ye-su, niurithi  uzima wa milele

3.	Ee bwana ingia moyoni mwangu, uwe wangu nami  kweli niwe wako.

4.	Ee yesu tawala maisha yangu, nihubiri neno lako siku zote.

songs.title: Yuda akarudi
songs.lyrics:
Yuda akarudi, chukua fedha zenu huyu ni mwema,
Pilato akakiri hana kosa lakini kamuueni,
Kainuliwa mtupu na kajeruhiwa sana,
Amekata roho, nchi inazizima kwa huzuni kuu.
Ona damu, mwili umelowana


1 Ona nyama, madonda mwili mzima

Moyo wake, nao umetoboka.

Mate yao, yamemfunika uso.

2 Meno yake, kang'ata kwa uchungu.

Nafsi yangu, imemjeruhi Yesu

Dhambi zangu, zikamchomoa roho

Mungu wangu, nionjeshe uchungu

3 Ili nife, pamoja naye Kristu

Mwisho nije, nikafufuke naye

songs.title: Yumo humu mwokozi
songs.lyrics:
Yumo humu mwokozi.


verse 1
Yumo humu mwokozi Yesu kwenye
Mzabibu na ngano tamu ni mpole ni mwema ni uzima.


chorus
Waumini simameni, polepole kwa maringo njongeeni karamuni mpate kumwonja mwokozi Yesu.


verse 2
Ekaristi ni Jina lake pamoja nasi Mungu mwenyewe ndani yetu nasi ndani yake


chorus
Waumini simameni, polepole kwa maringo njongeeni karamuni mpate kumwonja mwokozi Yesu


verse 3
Alitoa njioni ili, kwa kumbukumbu yake milele, tule tunywe wote tuokoke.


chorus
Waumini simameni, polepole kwa maringo njongeeni karamuni mpate kumwonja mwokozi Yesu


verse 4
Tugeuze maisha yetu yakafanana na meza hii huruma upendo na msamaha.


chorus
Waumini simameni, polepole kwa maringo njongeeni karamuni mpate kumwonja mwokozi Yesu

songs.title: Zaeni Matunda Mema
songs.lyrics:
ZAENI MATUNDA


Verse 1
Zaeni matunda mema, zaeni matunda yale
Zaeni yenye baraka, zaeni ya heri


Chorus
Bwana akiyapokea, yatabarikiwa vyema;
Zaeni matunda mema, zaeni ya heri.


Verse 2
Safisha mwenendo wako, safisha matendo yako;
Safisha na Bwana Yesu, safisha yote.


Chorus
Bwana akiyapokea, yatabarikiwa vyema;
Zaeni matunda mema, zaeni ya heri.


Verse 3
Fanyeni kazi kidugu, fanyeni kazi kwa bidii;
Fanyeni na Bwana Yesu; fanyeni yote.


Chorus
Bwana akiyapokea, yatabarikiwa vyema;
Zaeni matunda mema, zaeni ya heri.


Verse 4
Tolea matunda yako, pamoja na moyo wako;
Naye Bwana, Mungu wako, atakubariki.


Chorus
Bwana akiyapokea, yatabarikiwa vyema;
Zaeni matunda mema, zaeni ya heri.


Verse 5
Baraka za Mungu Baba, baraka za Mungu mwana;
Na za Roho Mtakatifu ziwe nanyi nyote.


Chorus
Bwana akiyapokea, yatabarikiwa vyema;
Zaeni matunda mema, zaeni ya heri.

songs.title: Zimetiririka Zimetiririka
songs.lyrics:
1. Zimetiririka zimetiririka,
Zimetiririka neema za Mungu

{ Zimetiririka, neema zimetiririka, neema zimetiririka
Wote tumeinuliwa aleluya } 

{ Majumbani mwetu (zimetiririka)
Mashambani mwetu (zimetiririka tiririka)
Familia zetu (zimetiririka) tumeinuliwa aleluya } *2

2. Tazama mimea inavyochanua,
Hizi ni neema kutoka Mbinguni

3. Tazama bahari na mawimbi yake
Vinashangilia neema za Mungu

4. Tazama wanyama wanavyopendeza
Ndege wa angani wanaburudisha

5. Mvua inanyesha jua inawaka
Kuukamilisha utukufu wake


6. Mchana na usiku vinatuongoza
Kuyafurahia majira ya mwaka

7. Mbingu zafurahi na mawingu yote
Vinashangilia neema za Mungu
